ReviewText: I bought my previous one in Ulta and i know this peeling solution is a pain serum but i bought this one on Amazon and it does not even give me a tinkle of pain. I am glad it doesn’t give me pain but i am concerned about the quality of the solution. Does anyone know if the Ordinary changes their formula on the peeling serum or should i stop using it?

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText: Apparently you have to refrigerate this in order for it to maintain it's effectiveness, I wish I knew that sooner :(, I think I will go another route, because I dont want to put my skincare in my household fridge or get a dedicated fridge for it either

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText: This works really well. Notice results after a few days.

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText: Ok, so I wasn't so sure about this. I felt it was all burn, not much reward. Some people have commented that it does not burn and in most cases that would be true but I always do a very aggressive microdermabrasion first before so it did burn quite a bit. But after, I never saw my skin crack up and peel any so I wasn't sure what was going on. But after about 4 days when I was applying my daily face regimen there was small amounts of skin I finally saw coming off. It was little clumps I was noticing in my creams. At first I thought maybe I had dried up food on my face somewhere but then I remembered I had done this a few days prior. It wasn't a life changing kinda product and the burn was nothing like a TCA peel. But there was also zero recovery time. You never see the skin peel. And honestly, I don't even know if I would have even had that amount of skin peeling without the microdermabrasion first. So I would highly recommend some kinda exfoliater if you don't have a MD tool at home. So you can truly maximize this product. Its a very light weight acid and i tried a patch peice on my hand and didn't feel any burn. So I imagine you wouldn't feel it on your face if you just put it on with the exfoliating first. But when I use acid, I want to feel the burn or else whats the point. This is a good solution if you want a light weight acid peel without a burning sensation. But don't expect huge results. You won't frost or peel significantly enough to combat weinkles and dark spots. It basically will speed up some skin shedding but it doesn't get deep enough for AMAZING results. I think it would be a good option though for summer time because you don't want to do a TCA peel during summer. I like it, it's not a 5 star product, but I think combined with other treatments you can achieve some results that can help.

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText:
Negative out of the way...why is this being sold for almost 3x the cost of direct from The Ordinary, Ulta, and others who sell it for less than $8. Shame on me for not actually looking around. I am usually good about this, but failed here. I read some great reviews and just hit Amazon, the price seemed good for what this is reported to do, so I ordered. Don't get me wrong even with the almost triple mark up, it is a great product.

I didn't get the miracle results minutes after use that many report. After rinsing I did notice skin was more "slippery" and smooth. It was nice, but not any different than a mud mask. It felt better but looked no different. A couple days later my skin began to peel and I noticed it was looking much better, and now I can fully recommend. I just did my second mask and have high hopes. My background is oily t zone, rough complexion, with anti aging goals.

I hit some sort of mid life crisis (I am 51) several months ago and started experimenting with skin care (pretty much did nothing before). Next to micro needling and retin A, this really makes the cut as a winner (Yes I use sun screen, but you don't notice the effects even though it is most important). I have 1/2 dozen other things that are meh.

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText:
For everyone feeling that the product was fake or arrived damaged, mine came intact and only the real product could be as efficient as this one was. I only took away a star because it is twice as expensive on Amazon, than at the store.
I have had mild peels in the past, some at home, some at a dermatologist office. The ones at home produced more irritation than results and I had given up on trying to find the right one for my fair, reactive skin.
I used the Ordinary 30% AHA 2% BHA peel the first evening I got it. The stinging only lasted a few seconds. Left it on for 10 minutes. The color did not bother me but it may bother others. After washing it off, all the little flakes and dullness have disappeared. I mean VISIBLY smoother, more glowing skin, no irritation. I did put on really rich night cream after and voila! Almost a week later my skin still feels incredibly smooth and looks fresh and glowing.
For the record, not a paid review or getting anything as part of a promotion. Just the best peel ever.

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText:
(46; skin expert. Dry skin that responds well to salicylic acid applied 3x/wk as it penetrates any oils on the skin or products applied to the skin before the salicylic acid, to dissove stuck oils in pores seen as tiny blackheads. Appropriate acid addict; willing to spend & experiment.)

That said*, very effecacious product from TO, Deciem at a crazy-reasonable pricepoint ! May make those newer to skin care, tingle toward the end of the 10 mins. DO exercise caution folks and do NOT go over the 10 mins.!!! Having an acid burn can take weeks to months to heal peeps, let alone dual* acid burns; your face is your builboard after all.
This stuff is proof, once again, that your skin does not have to visibly peel to be exfoliated well. Use it when staying in that night; face will be pink from the peel & naked face time may well be needed for the night/overnight.
Do not use the night before homecoming, prom, job interviews, going to a physician, hot date, or if you intend upon sun exposure the next day; an expert says this (I used this accordingly too). Do not apply any acids afterwards and gents, no shaving for you that night, kind of...or else ( youll have very angry skin not suitable for viewing by anyone).
Upon waking, do enjoy facial skin as smooth as a baby’s bottom and the serious reduction or disappearance of clogged pores! Voila!

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText:
I received the bottle poorly tightened with the dropper being oddly angled. Some of the product leaked onto out and the box it came in was beaten up and damaged.

The actual product is pretty syrupy and and a deep red. Doesn’t smell to bad or great. I will tell you THIS STUFF BURNS! I had no adverse reaction other then the burning which I had to endure for the 10 minutes the bottle recommends. After washing it off my skin still had a slight burn to it which wore off after a few minutes.

I could only assume that it was the product doing its job because my skin wasn’t rashy or inflamed afterwards. In fact I was left with smooth and fresh skin after the initial tingly/burning sensation wore off. Skin remained sensitive for the rest of the day and I couldn’t use moisturizer or anything immediately after. I did spray an aloe vera facial spray to soothe my skin.

I only used it once so far as the maximum recommended use is twice a week, but I will update after a few more uses.

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText:
12/18
First time using this peeling solution and purchased it based on reviews here. Very happy with this product! The directions on the box are very clear - it's a 10 minute peel and they emphasize not leaving it on longer than that. The solution is cherry red and somewhat runny - which is why I gave only 4 stars. It's easy enough (but a bit drippy) to apply on fingers then to face. As the directions say it's meant to be used as a masque and then removed. I immediately felt the product working on my skin. My skin isn't that sensitive so left it on the full 10 minutes. For those with more sensitive skin maybe less time would be best to start with or try a patch test as written in the directions. My skin was so soft and smooth afterwards as if I'd had a facial.
The directions say you shouldn't use this more than twice a week - and because it contains an alpha hydroxy acid (AHA) and a beta hydroxy acid (BHA) - sunscreen is NECESSARY in your daily facial routine.
The bottle will last a very long time and I will definitely keep using it.

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText: This is a chemical peel, but not a very strong one unless you leave it on your skin for longer than it says. This pill is very comfortable, and does what it has to do. It makes my skin super soft and radiant! I use it once a week, I leave it on for two minutes over what it says, so I leave it on for 12 minutes. And I leave it on for that time because I have the tolerance for it. After two complete months of using it on a regular basis once a week I really do see a difference. I’ve also purchased this from Ulta after I purchased it from Amazon just because it was out of stock when I needed it from Amazon. It’s a darn good buy.

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText: People mustve received an old bottle because mine looks exactly like the product if you were to buy it at a sephora or ulta. The tingling sensation is definitely there and builds as you leave it on longer. I definitely see a difference as far as my pores getting smaller and my skin being more hydrated. I also started using organic cold pressed virgin rosehip oil after rinsing off the chemical peel mask...with the being said, I have not peeled like I thought would happen. Could be due to the rosehip oil hydrating my face which I use everyday while only doing the mask 2x a week as directed. This is only the first full week of using it so will update as time goes along but so far so good.

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText:
I’m so confused on if I like this product or not. I can clearly see it helping my sun spots and “mothers marks” but every time I use it, I wake up the next day with the worst cystic acne all around my nose and inner cheek area. By the time it clears up its time to use it again and it happened again where I woke up with terrible bumps. I did this 3 times over the course of 6 weeks and am terrified to keep going but others have said this is a “purge” I truly hope that is the case because the texture of my skin is improving with each use.

P.s. don’t use this more than twice a week if even that.

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText: My 14 year old daughter talked me into trying this. We both love the way it makes our faces feel and look. We constantly fight over it so I recommend buying 2 if you have a teenager!

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText: 30% AHA! 2% BHA. I mean that's more than enough. Definitely a quality product, I mean yah its a bit much in the beginning so go easy on application and limit to once a week. This is by no means a solution to a problem for acne. It is basically for people who want a nice acid exfoliant much like how most people exfoliate with a scrub once a week or so. However, unlike a scrub this introduces some great acids meant for rejuvenating toning and turning over the skin. AND the color is purely so you can see what's going on when you're applying it.

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText:
Omg AMAZING!!! I had naively tried a high concentration TCA peel and burned small pick scars into my face in 2015. This solution has buffed them out and made them *MUCH* less visible. I kid you not enough to not want to cry anymore about it. I am in my 3rd treatment week in and I’m so confident in this product, counterfeit or not, that I’m applying it on other scars. This has also been working on a burn scar of a similar age.

Great news for anyone looking for balancing out complexion for burn, chemical, and acne scars. ;)

Good luck folks!

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText: Well it does help but I bought it for my armpit cause it’s all black for no reason it kinda getting whiter I used it on my face likes it’s supposed to be used but it kinda burned but overall it made my skin feel so fresh so I would definitely recommend ( maybe not for sensitive skin) pretty much 10/10

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText: This stuff rocks if your face can handle it. The product arrived as advertised and was an authentic product. I had too many breakouts and irritation after using, but I have had similar reactions when using active AHA’s and BHA products. This is not a reflection of this product but more my individual skin conditions. I have started to use this product on my back and butt-it works great there. Also you can use this on your feet (similar to like the baby foot type peel masks that are so popular now days). I recommend if you have experience with AHA’s and other acids.

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText: I was skeptical about this peel and after some of the online reviews, scared. However, as a novice to skincare and never used a peel before, I can tell you with confidence, don't be scared! Follow the directions and you will be fine. I loved my skin about 3 days after applying the syrum. At first I thought it wasn't doing anything, but then I started feeling the softness in my skin. I can't wait to see how continued use of this product further helps my late-30s skin.

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText: This product really helped my acne by exfoliating my face and getting ride of small bumps on my forehead that seamed to be resilient to other products. I do feel like it could be a little stronger though. Its a little itchy while its on my face but thats how i know its working. My face will be a little red on my cheeks after but only for about an hour. Doesnt cause flaking or drying. I have combination skin, mostly dry but i get oily in t zone.

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText: I've been using this once a week for a few months now, and no changes in regards to acne/blackheads/sebaceous filaments all of which I suffer from but no negative consequences either. It does, however, exfoliate really well. My skin is very oily and flakey on and around the nose but if I apply this for 10 minutes it's buttery smooth for a few days after.

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText: This is my holy Grail to deal with hormonal acne. I apply it right at the beginning and just after the end of my period and it keeps my skin clear. It's much better to use this as a preventative treatment rather than do spot treatment. They don't recommend this for inexperienced acid users but I naughtily ignore that. Just build up to using it for the ten minutes (I started from 5 and did one minute increments) and patch test.

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText:
I have hyperpigmentation in my mature skin. Also now noticeable fine lines. I was looking for an effective, safe and affordable home peel. This is a great one!
The application simple with my fingers. Instructions easy to follow.

I have used it 2 times in 1 week. The following day I did at home derma-plane. The improvement is apparent. I feel encouraged to continue using The Ordinary products daily and the peel weekly as the appearance and texture improve.

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText: Fine but doesn’t do miracles. After healing from cystic acne I’m always looking for something to help with my hyper pigmentation. Made my skin feel soft and did not irritate it but did very little to help with discoloration. If you regularly chemically exfoliate your face- do not expect out of this world results from this. Bought this as a Skincare By Hyram recommendation.

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText:
I usually buy this from Sephora, but they were out of stock for quite some time so I got it here. I gave it 4 stars instead of five because you can get this item at Sephore for $8. So the seller here is trying to make a quick buck. You can even buy it from the The Ordinary's website for cheaper than what this seller charges here on Amazon. JUST saying.

Product has always worked amazing for me. No issues there.

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText: I have not been good about using this twice a week but have used it about 4 times in the past month. It does sting a little but not too bad. Afterwards it sometimes stings a little still and I put the Ordinary 100% plant derived squalane serum on my face and it feels great. I haven’t noticed a huge difference but I like how soft and clean my skin feels afterwards. Would probably notice more of a difference if I could be better about using it!

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText:
The peeling solution comes in a small dropper bottle, which makes it fun to dispense the red colored peel on you face. I did a wrist test before using on my face, and leave the peel on for 5 minutes before washing and moisturizing my skin. Peel tingles, but not painful.

After using once a week for three week, my winter skin does look brightened. Using a combo of this peel and DRMTLGY microabrasion exfoliating scrub has treated and removed small bumps on my forehead near my hairline. Great product and price

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText: I’ve used this product one time, for five minutes. I have so far noticed my skin seems more glowy and smooth, and will continue using/updating my review as time goes on! I noticed many reviews trying to say this is a fake product because of color differences and figured I’d throw this in in case anyone was apprehensive to buy it because of those other reviews. This product changes colors because of the Tasmanian pepperberry they use in it. It changes color depending on season.

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText: I have used it once I still don't see any results

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText: I bought this thinking it was fairly priced but it turns out you can by it direct from The Ordinary for $7.20 and shipping is free for orders over $25. The product is way worth buying, it leaves your skin soft and minimizes your pores. I don't recommend leaving it on the full 10 mins to start with though in case your skin is sensitive.

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText: First, I have to say this is great for starling your roommates, as you will look like you did a DIY vampire facial. BUT it is fantastic! Extremely easy to apply and remove and it made my skin look so even and soft. However, you need to make note of the warning label- this product makes you more susceptible to sunburn. So get yourself a good moisturizer with SPF in it!

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText: Definitely stings when you put it on, but it exfoliates super well. My skin feels so good and soft after every use. Do only use it twice a week (keep the days you use it spread out) because it stings a LOT more if you use it frequently. Helps my acne scars heal faster which is super great!

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText: Lol I made the mistake of shaving before I used this product and it was super uncomfy haha but overall, I like how exfoliating this is and how it leaves my skin softer the next day. It does sting and itch when you put it on, just please please PLEASE don’t use this anywhere near scabs or freshly shaved skin!

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText: I always had hyperpigmentation wore makeup everyday once I started using this I noticed an immediate glow don't have much need for anything besides a moisturizer I was skeptical about it because I bought many products in the past that didn’t work please buy this you won’t regret it

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText: Make sure you follow the directions and only use it a couple times a week for ten minutes, but overall it has really cleared my skin and made it really soft and glowy! I thought it was over hyped on TikTok, but it's totally worth the money!

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText:
So, I've been doing facial peels for many years at home. Originally I would see my dermatologist about every other month and she would do them. Over time, I developed a long standing relationship with her, became a pharmaceutical rep and she gracefully and kindly "taught me the ropes" for performing the peels at home and at my own risk.

With that being said, I've used glycolic peels, TCA peels, natural peels, you name it, I've tried it. This peel by ORDINARY is something all together different in terms of results, process of application, and time. I received my bottle within two days and it was packaged well. I read the directions and proceeded to wash my face with Cetaphil for sensitive skin. I rinsed my face several times using warm to hot water and then a cool water rinse. I patted dry and waited for about 5 minutes before applying the ORDINARY peel. You never want to use a peel when your skin is wet or damp.

Once ready to apply, I used the dropper to suck some product up into the tube and then began lightly squeezing the dropper on my forehead, cheeks, chin and nose. Oddly enough, it does not really drip off your face. I'd say it's a bit thicker than a serum, but obviously thinner than a lotion. Once I thought I had enough product on my face using the dropper, I then spread the product around using a light touch with my fingertips.

After my face was covered completely (and kinda scary looking as it looks like blood), I then set the timer for 12 minutes. The directions say not to leave on the skin for longer than TEN minutes, but I know my skin and I know what it can handle and what it takes for a product such as this to work effectively. During the time the product was on my skin, somewhere around the 7 minute mark, I began to feel a slight tingling and burning sensation, somewhat like a sunburn, but definitely very tolerable. This means that the product is working and performing as it should. Yeah!

After my time was up, I rinsed my face for a good 5 minutes using cool water and making sure to not leave any product residue behind. I then patted dry very lightly and examined my skin in a high powered mirror. I was able to see areas of my skin where I've had previous issues of acne and slight wrinkles really respond to the peel. Yeah, again! I'm happy about this because this does not always happen with other peels. Seeing a response to the product means the product is really WORKING.

I waited about another 5 minutes after patting dry and applied a light moisturizer, Boots No7 Protect and Perfect Intense Advanced Serum, which is sort of part serum, part light lotion and excellent for sensitive skin. About an hour later I again examined my skin and found it to be glowing, a bit pink, soft and even textured. I have JUST FOUND MY NEW BEST FRIEND.

Not even considering price (which by the way is excellent), this will be my once a week go-to peel. It's not messy, it takes hardly any time to do and the results are fantastic. I'd recommend this to friends and others looking for an easy addition to their skin care routine, especially one that visible results are clear. At this time, I have no active acne breakouts, but I've had them on occasion in the recent past, perhaps a couple times a year I'll get one or two pimples. I think using this product regularly will prevent that from happening. I'm thrilled with my experience of the ORDINARY peel!

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText:
I'm 25 with combination, acne prone skin, and very sensitive. I have some fine lines on my forehead and around my eyes, (though I don't use it there) large pores and milia on the sides of my face. This stuff has helped with everything! After using it, my pores look so much cleaner and my skin looks and feels so smooth. My milia, which I haven't been able to get rid of in about a year, is almost completely gone, and the fine lines on my forehead seem much less visable. I'm not sure if this directly helps with fine lines, but it may have just improved the texture overall, so they aren't as noticeable. I was suffering from cystic acne on my chin and haven't had any harsh breakouts since I've been using this. I still get small breakouts occasionally, but its definitely improved from what it was.

Before I purchased this, I watched a few review videos on youtube, and decided to buy it. In one of the videos, a girl mentioned that you probably don't need to apply too much, so I decided to take her advice and only apply a thin layer. Like her, I didn't see any crazy, immediate results, but it did make my skin a bit softer and my pores appeared a little smaller. The burning sensation was pretty bad for the first 2-3 minutes, but not intolerable, so I decided to power through it. (In no way am I recommending this. Everyones skin is different) After a few minutes, it stopped burning completely, so I was able to leave it on for the full 10 minutes. I have pretty sensitive skin, and the burning felt like it does on my scalp when I've bleached my hair in the past.
The second time I used it, I applied a lot more to where it looked almost like the color it does in the bottle. The irritation was still a little harsh, but not as bad as the first time. I assume it was because my skin was already a little used to it. This time I saw much better results immediately! After this, I decided to start using a thick layer each time and the results have been amazing! Now that I'm realizing how much product I'm using, I'm taking it back a little and applying a thin layer again and still seeing great results.
I'm glad I watched videos and took the approach I did, because it allowed me to test it out to see how much my skin can handle and get used to it. Now, it doesn't burn too much, its more of just an itchy, tingling sensation, but I wouldn't recommend using it when your skin is very dry, cracked, or broken. If you do have dry skin, apply it immediately after you've rinsed your face so there's still a little moisture and avoid any areas where your skin is broken.

I only use it once a week, and although it says it should be used as a replacement of an exfoliant, I use a regular scrub at the end of the week, because my skin can get a little flaky, and I figure its safe enough if I'm only using the peel once a week instead of twice.

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText:
I don’t think I’ve ever used a skincare product that gave such impressive results so quickly. I used this stuff once and my skin was softer than it had ever been in my life, and I saw a huge visible difference. I now use it twice a week and my skin is incredibly soft and smooth (I had no idea how rough it was before). My pores are visibly smaller and it really rejuvenates my skin each time. There’s also a TON of applications in this bottle. I mean I use a few drops to cover my whole face, and that’s it. It’s a fantastic value for what you are getting, even if you buy it on Amazon where it’s way more expensive than directly from them.

This can be used by anybody, regardless of your skincare routine. Just put it on your face and wash it off 10 mins later, and enjoy your insanely smooth and soft face. I do it in the evening and follow with an overnight moisturizing mask, but you can just use your regular moisturizer.

This product alone made me start using The Ordinary products for everything because of how blown away I was that some weird red liquid made my face feel so good.

**UPDATE**

After using this product regularly for a couple of months, I went two weeks without using it, and I can confirm there is a huge difference between using this product and not using it. My face went back to being rough and feeling like it needed to constantly be exfoliated, and my pores got larger again. I also had some cystic acne that I was used to before I started using the peel every week. It was a nice reminder that this stuff actually does work wonders, and I'm not crazy.

Also, I noticed that it helped a ton in evening out my skin tone. I have some uneven pigmentation on my forehead from years of working in the sun, and as I've gotten older I've noticed that when summer rolls around and I start to pick up a tan, it really shows. This peeling solution really evened out those areas, and they're not nearly as noticeable as before. I think they would be gone within a year if I used this peel weekly.

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText: I did cosmetic dermatology in California for a few years and still do derm from time to time. I've seen what I can do in an office. This peel is the best peel I've run across. I do use a dermal pen. I use retinol as well but.... The biggest most dramatic change came from this peel. I use it twice a week. After I use Elta MD moisture seal with a half a scoop of cosmetica vit C powder. I've seen about 5 years come off my face in the last month. Given it takes 3 to 6 months to see changes I'm very excited about the future and seeing the changes. While watching the news I would randomly ask Alexa how old someone is. At 52 my skin is better than people in late 30s and early 40s. I still have laxity of age but the skin I have has improved so much with this peel. I wish I didn't have to wear a mask at work because the nurses always ask my advice about skin care and I can't show them how great it's looking. I'm looking at my skin and scars at 40x magnification. These changes are real! Do yourself a favor and get this peel!

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText:
First time user here so I probably shouldn’t be writing a review but I’m so impressed and 1 AM and I can’t tell anyone how amazing this is at the moment so here it goes.

Used as the directions said, cleanse face and allow face to dry...the way that was worded was odd so i did that exactly, I let my face air dry and then slathered it on my face and neck. I immediately started feeling a burning sensation on some parts of my cheeks and around my nose area (it wasn’t an aggressive burn though, like it was bearable, i wasn’t in tears or anything and didn’t leave me with burns on my face). I rinsed with luke warm water but more on the cool side, patted my face dry with a clean towel and immediately slathered fresh aloe vera gel on my face to help calm down the irritation, i let that sit on my face for a little and once it dried i also rinsed that off, kind of like a second mask but just to soothe and then i applied a facial oil, i use Squalane!

and my face is GLOWING, RADIANT and SO smoothe! i’m super pleased with my skin right now!! so i definitely see a difference in texture for my first impression

as for dark marks and discoloration, i can’t make a note of that only because that would take a few sessions to really notice a difference but i have a slight discoloration forming around my mouth area that does look more even with my skin tone now! but it wasn’t crazy dark beforehand either but yeah i will continue to use this and recommend it to everyone i know :)

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText: I’ve only used this product twice, but the way my skin looks after is amazing! A little drying, but honestly that’s to be expected and is mentioned on packaging. Didn’t irritate my skin whatsoever, and will definitely keep using in my rotation!

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText: I was using this product consistently for a month. I started at 2x a week, and reduced this to 1x a week. This has been the only product that I've used which worked to lighten hyperpigmentation scars along my jawline and chin area. I suffer from PCOS, and therefore developed scarring over the years, post facial hair removal. This immediately started lightening the scars/dark patches. DO NOT use other exfoliating products with this such as: cleansers with exfoliating beads, exfoliating sponges, or handheld electronic facial exfoliators. Also, I would not use this product within 24-48 hours of using hair removal techniques; rather they be creams or razors. This is what halted my use, after I burned the skin in my smile creases above my lip, after I'd previously *lightly* shaved my moustache (using an eyebrow archer style razor). My skin blistered, and was very irritated. I also burned the area around my hairline, which I'd previously been rubbing. Therefore, take care to ensure you've not rubbed, shaved, or been too abrasive with your skin care routine prior to using this. I would consider my issues user errors, and found the product worked wonders for what I purchased it for: removal of hyperpigmentation along my jawline. I treated the new skin issues IMMEDIATELY with organic ivory shea butter, and they've already resolved, and left no additional scarring. Other than these warnings, I absolutely love this product!! Will be resuming use soon, and continuing to lighten my jawline. With very careful use, this product is sure to help, and I hope this review does also.

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText: This peel by the ordinary is awesome Once a week on face for 10 minutes does wonders for my skin... My skin is more glowing and clear for such a great price. Give it a try and you won't be sorry

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText:
I’m super embarrassed to share these pictures, but this product is too good not to share the results!

I have had cystic acne on my face since I was 13. Hormonal changes tended to cause the worst flare ups, but overall I was constantly breaking out. I wore makeup pretty much 24/7 trying to hide it which only made matters worse...

After using this product for 3 months I have now stopped wearing makeup entirely. I am in awe of how healthy my skin looks and feels! My overall complexion has changed dramatically, my pores are significantly smaller and my skin feels so soft!

I used the peel about 2-3 times a week to start. It did sting quite a bit the first few times I used it but it was bearable and never left any major irritation behind. After the first month, I started using it once a week and now I use it about every two weeks and have also started using the face moisturizer and under eye caffeine solution by the same company.

I can’t recommend this product enough! Everyone’s skin is different of course, but I have generally very sensitive skin and this stuff worked wonders for me!

Side note: If you can purchase through Ulta or the company directly, it is WAY cheaper. But if you can only purchase through Amazon for whatever reason, it’s still worth every penny!

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText:
I’m 35 and working with all the potions so I keep getting carded. “Oh you think I’m 27, 28?” I don’t hate it! It took awhile for this to grow on me but once I saw results over the course of 2 weeks, I was impressed and a believer! It helps with minimizing pores, but I use it addition to other products as well. I can’t give all the credit Eva but her participation in my pm routine is one of importance! My face feels a little tight I’m a good way after I apply it but with additional moisturizers, my face feels so clean and fresh! I only use it at night, the sun made my face a little pinker than usual. It wasn’t painful, just annoying and it feels like my face is the color of Bubble Yum, which isn’t uncommon. But it’s fine overnight!

For awhile I didn’t use it because it’s not very viscous and it was hard to apply. I saw a video of someone taking the dropper and swiping it across her forehead, cheeks, chin and neck, working each in sections. Game changer, y’all!

Lastly, it works and it’s affordable- 2 important things I assess. I wish I could do everything Drunk Elephant all day everyday but be real, I, personally, am not that rich. Eva keeps me lookin fresh on a budget.

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText:
So this is now I think the 3rd bottle I have bought. For some context I have mild normal acne as well as cystic acne (mostly hormonal). So this means I get mostly blackheads and congestion, a few whiteheads and cysts around my chin mostly. This product is one of the only products that I have used consistently and it continues to work well.

I use this almost every other day (which I know some people will say is too much) but it was worked perfect for me. And I do not have oily skin, I have combination skin and even using this product so frequently it has not caused much dryness (although I use a lot of moisturizer afterwards). As the directions say I use it for about 10 minutes as well and it stings a little bit, but definitely isn't painful in my opinion. Over time I think this has helped my pores shrink and my face look less congested. I would recommend this product to almost anyone no matter what your skin concern is.

In fact, a few weeks ago I ran out of this for a little over a week and found myself getting a lot of pimples. I do not know if not using this product was the direct cause but I definitely think it influenced my breakout because I am back to using this product and no longer have pimples very frequently.

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText:
LONG REVIEW AHEAD!!!

I had perfect skin until I went on birth control as an adult. I don’t have sensitive skin however any blemish I get will leave a dark spot no matter if I squeeze it or not. My hormonal acne has been making me feel super self conscious especially when I had great skin prior to Depo.

I’ve tried everything. Vitamin C. Turmeric. Retinol. And nothing has worked better than this.

I’d like to advise however I DO NOT USE THIS AS DIRECTED! I use this every other day because in my opinion my skin is already trash so what do I got to lose besides dark spots? I cleanse with my Clarisonic, dry my face and apply for 10 minutes every other day at night. And not on the same day I use a retinol cream or Vitamin C serum. I use after cleansing and before toner. If you use a spin brush or an exfoliating cleanser this mask is going to BURN. Not unbearable but definitely not comfortable. And definitely patch test before using something this strong.

The first picture in my review was the day before I used it and the second picture is a week later to the day after applying this mask every other day (I don’t advise anyone else to do this so don’t blame the ordinary if you burn your skin off)

I recommend 10000000%

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText: Im a little astonished as I think this products actually works. Ive tried many lotions & potions and really....not much does much. This works immediately. I can feel it tingling/slightly burning within seconds. I have never left it on for more than 10 mins and I rinse my face thoroughly afterwards. It gets rid of dead skin (it is better than exfoliating by far), my skin does look smoother and not as dry. Now....its not getting rid of the wrinkles, however I am very satisfied with this. I do think my skin looks better.

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText: So glad I bought this. I am obsessed with acid peels because how healthy it makes your skin look. I have battled tretinoin for over a year and never again. This line of acid products had dramatic results fast! I am team acid. This is my favorite because it works and it is amazing. It is a strong acid peel. But not damaging at all. It's not going to break you out or stress your skin. I used to suffer from random cystic acne breakouts. I did research and thankfully discovered using acid's. This is the best brand and it's so cheap. Compare the ingredients to expensive brands. This stuff will change your life. If you have any type of problematic skin The whole line will clear it up. I have gone from blotchy red random acne on my jaw to beautiful tight and glowing skin. My pores are practically invisible and I have glowing skin for the first time in my life. Thank God for the ordinary. My Ordinary products are : I use the glycolic acid toner and 10% Lactic acid peel every night with the caffeine eye serum and after the lactic has dried I apply Hyaluronic acid and a few nights a week I use glycolic acid peel the other 2 nights I use this awesome AHA peel. But this AHA is the strongest of those. Love it.

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText: Seems to be working and keeping my face looking great

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText:
Ok, this is the holy grail of masks.

I LOVE The Ordinary. I have long used their niacinamide serum and glycolic acid peel. But I really needed something a little less potent, since my skin had become dryer with the medications I am on.

Insert this angel. I added it to my routine (Cetaphil wash, The Ordinary Glycolic Acid Toner and Corsx Snail serum, on a weekly basis). This is the third week and I have noticed a huge diminishing in my uneven skin tone and acne scarring. I look younger and my skin glows after. It doesn’t burn like stronger peels and my skin only slightly reddens after.

I suffered from adult acne for a couple years. Since I started using the routine mentioned above, along with spironolactone, my skin has improved SO much. I often go without makeup now.

You really can’t go wrong with The Ordinary, but this mask in particular is amazing.

Photo is of my face immediately following using the mask.

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText:
I’m a big fan of The Ordinary brand overall and had wanted to try this for awhile. I use it about once every 2 weeks on my face, beck and chest and still have a lot left in the bottle. The consistency is very fluid so be careful not to drip into your eyes or mouth. I typically use a clean makeup brush to spread it all over and set a timer. Either in the shower or sink I use a soft cloth to gently remove it.

I would advise using it for only a few minutes at first and build up to the max 10 min. It’s very strong, but because it doesn’t really burn like some AHA’s it can seem like it’s not doing enough. Definitely wear sunscreen and moisturize well after use.

I had cystic acne for years and then developed mild melasma from birth control. Using this in my routine has really helped to smooth the texture of my skin and make it brighter overall. My other products soak right in and my texture is improved.

Just as a recommendation- if you use a retinol, I would plan to not use it a few nights before doing this peel. Retinol and AHA’s can be over exfoliating to your skin causing severe irritation, redness, burning, peeling and worst case: scarring.

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText:
I’m 41 years old, and have blotchy, uneven skin, hyperpigmentation, and just kind of overall feel like my skin has just gone to heck in the last 5-7 years with aging. I’ve been taking steps over the past several years to start trying to make up for lost time with caring for my skin...which I hadn’t bothered with before I hit my late 30’s.

I can see a REMARKABLE difference after using this product only twice so far! I really didn’t expect a whole lot, but figured I had nothing to lose....and there is absolutely a difference in my skin texture - sooo much smoother!! Hyperpigmentation has faded - and as much as it’s faded after only using this stuff 2 times, I anticipate it will only continue to improve! My skin looks fresher, younger, and the blotchiness is gone. My skin is an even color - just dealing with those hyperpigmentation areas, which are fading out already.

Great stuff - I will continue to buy and there is literally NO WAY on Earth that you can use this stuff and NOT see improvement. You WILL see a difference.

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText:
This product has lasted me three months so far and I use it at least once a week. If you’ve never had a professional chemical peel, then you should know - this tingles and itches like a professional peel. My skin is red for about 20 minutes after. Sometimes the intensity of it has me hop around from foot to foot and fanning my face. However, it does a great job of increasing brightness. I would recommend using this as a step in a sequence of skincare, not as a stand-alone product. For example, I will use this on a night when I: steam, double cleanse, tone, ionic clean w/nutritive oil, dermaplane, THEN use this peel as a last step before I add my nightly moisturizer/treatment.
It’s a strong product- I would compare it to Drunk Elephants Sukari Baby Facial, for a fraction of the price.
I will buy again. I do believe the product helps primarily with exfoliation. I feel like I’m doing something in between medical peels.

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText: I highly recommend this product if you have sensitive skin and you've thought about chemical peels but are scared of the recovery time or harshness of it! This left me feeling super smooth after the first day or so! I have skin texture, pores/blackheads on my nose and an occasional break out of acne, which this helped with. I use it about every week and a half or two weeks, and will typically start off with a hot shower and facial cleanse and then a bore strip while the pores are open, then I'll use this for the recommended 10 minutes (try less if you are using for the first time to see how sensitive you are.) I do notice redness and "warmth" after I use it for about 30 minutes, but use a moisturizer and then Mario Bedescu facial mist as needed for extra moisture. I experience some extra skin roughness the morning after I use it, but the days after are phenomenally smooth and I do see break out resolved and clearer pores! I highly recommend this budget friendly product! (Also it's $9 from The Ordinary's site)

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText: Love everything from this company. Just as good as the super expensive brands, but for a fraction of the cost. I use this once a week and it’s made a difference in my complexion.

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText: I had moderate to severe acne scaring, crepiness, and discoloration. I've always taken good care of my skin, but bad skin (cystic acne and premature aging) runs in the family. After Accutane my acne has pretty much gone, but my skin looked much older than it should. I started using this at the same time as retinol, vitamin c, and hyroaluric acid. I think they all help, but I can see and feel a dramatic difference immediately after using this. My skin looks and feels pretty much normal now. It definitely seemed abnormal before especially in sunlight. One somewhat negative was that it lightened my skin. I had thought the light parts of my super blotchy skin were the discoloration. Turns out it was the dark spots which makes sense since my skin was lighter as a child. I'll take it though since my scars and crepiness are so much better.

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText:
This stuff is amazing. Like... WHY DID I WAIT?? Seriously, everyone should incorporate this into their skin care routine. I use it ~2 times/week and my skin is so much more smooth and bright. I use this in lieu of exfoliating since i never liked the idea of scraping my skin. This works even better imo. Yeah, it kinda hurts, but only for the first 30 seconds. And I find once that's done, you can really wash it off right then. If you use retinol nightly, skip the nights you use this peel and replace with hyaluronic acid instead to keep from traumatizing your skin too much. Also an aloe vera-based moisturizer works wonders for the aftercare. I like Holika Holika's aloe sheet masks or their aloe pack. Anyone can use this, as long as you follow up with soothing moisturizers.

My pores have actually shrunk and my texture is so much better. For like 12 bucks, what do you have to lose?

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText: I've heard many refer to this as the holy grail of face product, some even going as far to say it must be the blood of the blessed Virgin Mary. I'm not sure about all of that, but it does do a lot to remove the dry skin and buildup from your face, smoothing out lines, exfoliating, revealing new fresh layers of skin. Helps a lot with pore blockages and making red marks fade faster. Makes the turnover rate of the skin happen faster. Do not leave on skin for longer than 10 minutes, as it can cause irritation . But your face will look much fresher after a week or two of use !

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText: I'm pretty darn impressed with this product! I had purchased this after several reviews and tutorials seen on YouTube and with explanation of it's benefits if it's incorporated into a daily facial routine. It explains how it can help your skin if consistently used either 1-2 times a week depending how sensitive your skin is. It also helps prevent future acne you may be getting. The product is a great consistency, it's a deep rich red, and has an almost fruity soft smell that is not harsh at all. Do not leave it on no longer than 10-12 minutes as they state, and it rinses of easily. My skin in the end has a beautiful glow, my skin is super soft and supple it's amazing how it improves my skin after only 10 minutes. So far I am starting to see some of my pores and scars diminishing. Granted I know it may not fully go away, but they are helping minimize what i have.

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText: This product takes some patience but it is WORTH IT. The first time I used it, I left it on for way too long, had terrible peeling and irritation and ended up quitting it for a while. Then I saw a YouTube review of it and tried it again. This time, I started with a thin layer all over my face and neck, leaving it on for exactly five minutes (not more). I used it about every 4-5 days on on those days I didn't use any retinol products. Follow it up right away with a good moisturizer and even the Ordinary Marula Oil. I've found this has really evened out my complexion, helped with adult acne and blackheads, reduced some hyperpigmentation, smoothed my skin and given me a glow I haven't had, well, ever. Recommend searching for some videos on how to use this correctly and then TRY IT! Oh, and the price point is impossible to beat.

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText: This product of Ordinary Peeling Solution 30ml AHA 30% + BHA 2%, 1 Fl Oz works as is described in all of the reviews, I tried it last night for the first time, applied to face, left it on for 10 mins, rinsed off and my face feels clean and better than it has trying other products, I am going to wait a few weeks and try twice per week and will update with more results.

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText: The results weren’t dramatic but unlike most over the counter products they were definitely there. I’ve been using it twice a week for a couple of months and absolutely have seen a difference. I still have faint spots but I’m sure over time they’ll completely fade. I did take a before & after (same lighting & can see an obvious difference) but I’m just too shy to post pictures of myself lol. I’ve even had a couple of my friends give me some positive comments lately which is what even reminded me that it was probably worth it to write a review. If you’re too sketched out to get professional chemical peels or IPL order this stuff instead. It’ll take longer to get results but you will get them and won’t run the risk of a botch job. It does sting/tingle a bit but nothing crazy. Just take the directions seriously and keep it out of reach of kids.

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText: The picture is from the morning after. Don’t mind my lips as I had micro-needled lightly the night before with my Dr. Pen and had HA and aquaphor slathered on my lips- I did a very superficial micro-needle then used the peeling solution. It gets warm and tingly almost like a light burn but not unbearable; after the peel I used Buffet from The Ordinary then Elemis pillow facial night moisturizer with a small mix of Elemis Superfood glowing moisturizer (I mixed the smallest drop in the pillow facial moisturizer). My skin was so soft and when I woke up I was shocked to already see a difference. I stood in front of a window so sunlight would show my skin and flaws! I use this now at least once a week depending if I’m using my retinoid. Highly suggested!

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText: I wish I had discovered this when I was younger. My acne isn’t as bad as it used to be but I still get some cystic bumps from time to time especially around my period. I also tend to have to exfoliate my skin a lot especially around my forehead. It seems like my skin seems to build up more than most, probably because I suffer from extreme oily skin. I tried this out cuz it seems exfoliating with other products just wasn’t doing the job. This product does not burn, it feels a little “spicy” but mostly just kinda itchy. But it’s tolerable for 10/15 minutes. I began using this along with a derma roller and pure Hyaluronic acid and my skin has seriously improved and it hasn’t even been a month. I had a pretty big crease in my forehead from getting a bad case of sun burn when I was 14, and now at 23 it’s almost completely gone and I can’t be more happy

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText: I’ve been using this product for about a year now and still continue to see results. The skin on my face and neck are remarkably brighter and smoother when I use it. I’ve gotten spoiled to the results and can definitely notice a difference when I skip it. It’s an incredible value.

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText:
This product is a great alternative to mechanical exfoliators (exfoliating beads or particles) which can cause tears in the skin; however, if you have sensitive skin, I would caution that you test the product on a small area of your skin before applying it all over. Further, I would also suggest that you do not leave the product on for the full 10 mins if your skin is sensitive.

I use this product when I notice that my skin is looking dull. I make sure to moisturize and drink plenty of water following the treatment as it can really dry out the skin. It may leave your skin red after removal, but this should go away within a few minutes. It can also lead to minor breakouts and its cleansing the skin and drawing out bacteria/dirt in your pores so I recommend using this product after any important events!

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText:
THE HOLY GRAIL!! It hasn’t even been a week of me using this product and Derma E cream ( DERMA E Skinbiotics Treatment... https://www.amazon.com/dp/B001R1E2FK?ref=yo_pop_ma_swf ) AND I’M SO HAPPY LIKE MY PORES ARE GONE, MY PIMPLE ARE BASICALLY GONE, MY ACNE SCARS ARE MINIMAL!!
Like wow. This past year, my skin has been the ROUGH like worse looking than potholes on the freeway.
Now I am SO confident, i am thriving! I used it three times this past week (First pics: 12.17) and the second row of pics is (12.23)
I would recommend this product with the derma E cream to those who still struggle with acne, huge pores, and acne scars!
I have tried EVERYTHING and this has been giving me the best results I am so excited for further results!

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText: Life changing. I’ve had terrible acne and have acne scars. Had laser skin resurfacing and other lasers and was on accutane twice for cystic acne. I’m telling you nothing has done as much for me as this peel has. I have been using it for a little over two months. Once a week for ten minutes maximum. After I don’t use anything else on my skin for 24 hours. I then resume nightly retinol cream. I haven’t had a breakout once, and my scars are diminishing. I don’t they they’ll ever go away totally but really are not as noticeable and my skin looks so much better. It is about $5 more than the Ordinary’s website, but with the shipping and the two week wait you need if you order from there this is a much better deal in the end. Also, it does burn and itch a bit when you first put it on, but it’s an acid! Of course it will....

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText: Even beginners in skincare can safely use this. I haven't been using this long enough to see a change to my texture, but this is the first time since I was 22 (30 now) that I don't have a single pimple/ clogged pore on my face. The max amount of time I handle with a generous layer of is 3 minutes (the darker the color red on your face, the greater the sting in my opinion; a really opaque layer caused hardly any stinging at all [which only feels like stinging pins, in a 2/10 on a pain scale; almost like really broken skin when you put pimple ointment on it]). I only do it once a week, always at night, wear a generous amount of sunscreen and try to shade my face from sun the next day. No post-application sensitive or discomfort. As gentle as a chemical exfoliator can get.

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText:
Ok, so when I first tried this product I was pretty sure I’d bought a dud. Put it on and felt no tingles or had any indication it was working whatsoever but as soon as I took it off- brighter, clearer skin revealed. I would say I saw a 60-70% reduction in the skin issues plaguing me before I tried this.
My aesthetician recommends I do regular glycolic peels on my own at home so this is what I do twice a week. I’m pretty sure I could use this more times a week Bc I’m sure my ski. Could handle it but I don’t want to waste product.
For what I paid and the speediness I’d delivery, I’m very happy with this product. In addition I also use glossiers the solution and lots of moisturizers. Sunscreen is just so you don’t add on more damage to your freshly beautified skin 🤗.

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText: I have used this peel twice and already see smoother skin. It has also lightened a dark mark from a years old acne scar on my cheek. I have pale skin, am in my late 30s and recently the texture of my skin has started looking sort of rough. I have always exfoliated with various scrubs three times a week but they weren't cutting it anymore so I thought I would try a peel. It does sting a little initially but that wears off about three minutes in. I also noticed the pores on my nose that look like little black dots no matter what I use are actually almost undetectable now which is awesome. It takes very little of this solution for each treatment so it is definitely worth the money. My skin looks better than it did after I the one time got a facial. Definitely recommend. Don't forget to use sunscreen EVERY day. Especially if you are using this type of product.

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText:
I have already bought 2 of these, and wasn't even done with the first bottle before I bought my second. I have a friend whop has some skin trouble, and I just gave her the rest of my bottle because I believe in the stuff so much and wanted her to try it. I bought mine immediately after so I wouldn't have to go long without it. I have a very pale complexion, combination dry oily skin. I have never kept the peel on for more than 10 min, and have not had a problem with burning or stinging after it is removed.
Whenever I feel a breakout coming on I make sure to use this peel to give my skin just the pick me up it need. Definitely will continue to keep buying this item, and hopefully try out more of The Ordinary products in the future!

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText: I did some research and found this face peel as one of the top face peels to get. It did not disappoint! I've used this product about 3 times so far. I was little worried before my first use, after I bought it I read the label said not suitable for sensitive skin. So I only used a small amount. It felt slightly tightening/warm sensation but very mild. I left it on for 10 min as suggested. It did really well and I had no reaction to it so the next couple of times I used a bit more. I've had no problems with it. I have some rosacea on my cheeks but it didnt bother it which I was surprised. It left my skin super soft and didn't hardly dry my skin like I thought it would. Great product and I'd highly recommend!

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText: I got this for dark spots. Earlier this yr I had a couple of breakouts that left very dark black marks on my face. I was using a daily serum, but it kept making me get more pimples. Even if I don't pick my pimples I get post inflammatory hyper pigmentation, that takes years to go away if I don't use something to hurry the process. Anyway I got this product on July 5th. I've used it every Thursday and Monday, for 10 min since (today is Aug 27th). I have seen a major improvement. My dark marks are no longer super dark, more like a light light brown color. I still have more than half the bottle left and I use it all over my face. It's def a very gentle peel. I don't get any peeling of flaking. I don't even really feel it stinging, but it works wonders. I'm very satisfied.

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText: Warning: If you have sensitive skin this may not work for you or you'll need to use it for less than 10 minutes and only one or two days a week. I personally LOVE this product and I've got tough skin so I can do this every other day. Basically it's an acid mask so it's thicker than you would expect, and it's beet red so don't be surprised. Anyway this mask appx 3-4 times a week along with my Vitamin C Serum and Glycolic Acid Face Cream (other companies) has made a HUGE difference in my skin (I'm almost 57). My aesthetist can't believe the difference and in fact wrote the products down, and told me not to waste my money on an acid peel or microdermabrasion at their clinic because she can't see where it's going to help more than what I'm already doing!

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText: Very pleased with the product: I’m 36 with mild acne on oily skin and didn’t know what exact products to use honestly cuz there’s 9 million choices at the stores. I never tried a peeling solution before. My dermatologist recommended this brand cuz she uses it. I use this Wednesday and Saturday’s for 6-7 minutes. My skin does feel tingly. Then she recommended Vitamin C solution, Trentonin Rx, eye cream, Neutrogena Oily skin moisturizer and AcneZone face wash. To warn you the color of this is blood red: that’s the thing I wish I could change cuz it looks gore-y, but I’m happy with results. Used for 1 month and my face looks smoother and I had 2 enlarged pores on my forehead I thought I’d live with forever (Derm says nothing could really be done in office). The pores have minimized greatly and I think will continue to with more use.

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText: Love the ordinary products. My acne has always been there since I was a teenager and I’m now 34 years old. I finally found the products that my face loves and that’s helping me clear my acne. There is a slight sting at first, but just make sure you don’t keep it on more than 10 minutes and don’t do it more than twice a week. I consider this a lighter peeling product and it doesn’t make your face red or over peel. I didn’t even notice the “shedding of dead skin”. I have recently been doing a face care routine this year and I never knew my face would go through “purging” but after the process for about a month or so. You will see awesome results and clearer skin! Love the ordinary products and make sure you moisturize afterwards.

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText: Typically to exfoliate, I have a clairsonic that I use about 3-4x a week, which worked well for the time but it was a pain to travel with it and there was always a contingency period where my face would be red for about 30 min - 1 hr. I discovered this product from a friend's instagram accct and I LOVE IT. Now, I use this product about 2x a week and it exfoliated better than my clairsonic had ever. Because I have sensitive skin, I used this product in small increments leaving it on for 3 min, then 5, then now 10. Be careful though to make sure that the skin is dry before use or it will sting. This product has helped me eradicate decades of acne scars, whiten my skin, and give me more of a glow. Highly recommend!

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText: Beyond impressed with the ordinary peeling solution! Now these are authentic- there are two slightly different formulations the company released to meet country guidelines. These are the North American/Canadian version as seen by the blue mark on the bottle. I read this on the website and ordered a comparison bottle from the company. This one from amazon is the real thing and tingles a bit when on the face. I’ve been using it twice a week for three weeks now along with beauty counter, Elemis cleansers, and other ordinary serums and I am blown away by how my skin is changing! I am getting subtle softness and elasticity back and my skin looks clear and smooth like it did 20 years ago! Very impressed. Ordinary brand has become my new favorite.

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText: First off, if you have sensitive skin steer so clear of this thing. My dudes I am not even kidding about this one. It will eat straight through your skin and into your SOUL. That being said, for the rest of us this thing is AWESOME. I have dry-normal skin with occasional peeling and this plows straight through the dead stuff. I use it once a week (as directed) and have seen great results after four months of consistent application. Smoother skin and overall less breakouts. Final tip: PILE ON THE SUNSCREEN AFTER YOU USE THIS! If you don't dream of being a wrinkled leather handbag someday please protect your skin after peeling layers off of it. No joke this leaves your skin very sensitive for the days following. Always wear sunscreen, but especially after this one.

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText: I was expecting this to feel harsher then it does, considering other reviews. I struggle off and on with my skin, and the last few months it’s been really dry which has led to some pesky break outs I couldn’t get under control even after seeing my esthetician 2 times for microdermabrasion. The first time I used this my skin actually felt hydrated and softer. I followed it with aloe and my usual moisturizer. I gave it a week or so before using again. Then I used it 2 nights in a row, both followed again with aloe and moisturizer. My Dry skin is finally subsiding and my break out isnt nearly as bad! I don’t want to over do it, but I truly think my skin needed this stuff to get the dead layers off & am Hoping to continue to have good results.

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText: I'm totally in love with this stuff and I've only used it twice so far!! I've spent so much time and money trying to get rid of blackheads. Using masks and pore strips and peel off masks and everything, but I could never get them out. I finally was doing research and came upon the magic of salicylic acid. I've used this twice and after the second time I could see the blackheads actually start to surface which was super interesting. I'm also using a 20% salicylic acid, so I'm pretty sure it's a combo of the 2, but seriously, my skin is already thanking me. I am 27 and have been struggling with acne for half of my life. This past week I've been comfortable going out with no makeup, and my skin just glows! I can't wait to see the progress once I've been using this longer.

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText:
Hello! I have dehydrated combo acne prone skin, and am very used to AHA and BHA in my daily skincare routine. I definitely enjoy this mask as a quick exfoliation on the go if I don't have time for my proper routine, but I wouldn't use it any more than 1x a week because it is quite strong. However - one of the best parts of it, and what I consider my favorite part is how the solution is tinted a deep cranberry color. It makes it so simple to make sure you have all traces off your face when you rinse it off - especially with acids of this concentration, if left on it could severely burn your skin.

I'll most definitely repurchase, I enjoy having a peel once a week and it makes my skin so glowing! Really recommend

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText: Overall i like this product a lot, it shrinks my pores and makes my skin soft. i’ve seen people use it all over their face but that actually makes me break out. i suggest, if you have sensitive or combo skin, to use it only on the spots where it’s needed. for example i use it on my t zone, chin, and directly next to my nose on both sides where my acne is bad and my pores are the largest. it clears everything up right away. However, i would never use it on my cheeks or forehead because it would do more harm than good. it doesn’t hurt that bad at all and it causes very minimal redness that goes away after about an hour.

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText:
This stuff is skin saving if you have scarring and need that extra boost. The first time I used it, I had oil cleansed first like with most masks and because it is a chemical solution, it mixed with the leftover oil and started irritating/itching my skin. I washed it off and tried the next day - without having cleansed or ANYTHING beforehand and it worked perfectly. I do it on Saturday mornings when I have coffee right when I wake up before I do my skincare routine so there is no residue or products on my skin that could irritate it.

I use The Ordinary's Natural Moisturizing Factors + HA, Vitamin C Serum, and the Rosehip Oil and this has been an excellent addition to my routine. Again, read the directions! This isn't any old sheet mask you can slap on after a shower.

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText: The quality of this is excellent. The liquid is thick and a reddish color making it easy to apply and showing if you've missed any spots. I left it on 10 minutes as directed and only experienced mild stinging. My skin was very bright afterwards and felt a little firmer. I applied it 2 days ago and haven't had any flaking or peeling, which is a little disappointing since it's a peel, but I plan to use it again in the next few days and to leave it on longer this time. Despite that, I really do feel that the product is "as advertised." I've used other at home peels and the quality of this is higher than those. I would say if you're looking for a mile peel, this is a great choice.

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText: After one use , yes just one , I saw a huge difference in the fine lines right underneath my eyes. I just turned 21 and have started to become a lot more dedicated on spending time nourishing my skin. I have started my skin journey with a lot of researching and hours of searching for the right products to purchase that will suit my skin and that will fit perfectly in what my skin routine lacks. I came across this and I have to really thank the ordinary for creating a product that comes just as close to getting a professional facial treatment. Yes it does dry out your skin if left on for too long and yes it’s suppose to feel tingly. DO NOT USE LONGER THEN RECOMMENDED. Also use sunscreen while using this product

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText:
Love love love this product! I definitely have suffered with acne my entire life into adulthood and this product (I use at least once weekly but not more than twice a week) has cleared my acne, given my skin a glowing appearance and has faded my acne scars. I am always skeptical with these types of products and have yet to find one that actually works but then i found this one. Highly recommend for acne prone skin, but you must use a good moisturizer after (I have always used aveeno calm, which works great after this product!!).

Just make sure you never ever use this product on wet or damp skin, it definitely burns badly and I learned that the hard way!

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText:
This is doing the job for me. Prepare for a fairly intense tingling / burning when you put it on at first. Oh ya, and be sure to warn anyone who may be around you while you have this mask on as it looks like blood! Ha! I have scared my partner so many times walking out of the bathroom with this on my face. You can have fun with that! :)

This delivers the exfoliation I need. I can tell it works by the slight dryness I get the next day after this mask + very mild flaking that goes away after about 12 hours. It is easy to hide if you keep your skin hydrated. It doesn't look bad by any means. I like to use this product on Sunday nights and by Tuesday I have glowy, "new" skin.

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
ReviewText:
I’d heard about the Ordinary and bought this peel in a treat yo self moment. I have sensitive skin and patch tested it first without any reaction. I applied it to clean, dry skin and it has a slightly almost burning sensation- like if you rubbed freshly squeezed orange juice on your face as an exfoliant- not painful, but it’s definitely doing something.

I know it’s a you have to try it for yourself, but I think there was a small improvement to the visibility of my pores, especially around my nose. Hopeful for more improvement with more use, though I’ll probably stick to the recommendation of 2x/week only.

If you’re on the fence, it’s a good price, it shouldn’t irritate your skin, and it’s likely you’ll see results!

Product Name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution, Advanced Exfoliating Peel for Brighter Skin
