Product Name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Multi-Depth Hydration Serum for Plumper, Smoother Skin
ReviewText: I did not have packaging problems as other reviewers did. I do wish that it had a pump bottle because I accidentally spilled some tettering it on my bed when doing my nightly routine. At first I had to use 3 drops and now only 2. My skin has responded in ways I hadn't thought of. All of my face is smoother, acne more under control, products go on smoother and I need less of them as well. My skin tone in more even, less reddish pink from current and past acne. I use it first after washing and then my eye balm directly after. I usually wait 5 minutes to apply other products over it. I can also use a lightweight moisturizer like Trader Joe's and not a heavier night cream...nice to only have to deal with one moisturizer. This is a hands down no brainer. I did also put it in my 3-1-1 bag at the airport and had no issues with the glass bottle.

Product Name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Multi-Depth Hydration Serum for Plumper, Smoother Skin
ReviewText: Two years ago, I noticed my daily moisturizer wasn’t as effective as it used to be and read about this brand being an excellent value. I have noticed my fine lines easing and even disappearing in places, I don’t need a strong moisturizer- just a light daily one with sunscreen. People believe I’m younger than I really am, it has even helped the lines on neck and décolleté. My makeup applies more smoothly, and I need less now than I used to— especially if I use primer, which allows it to last all day. I highly suggest this serum for everyone even in their 20s and older, it works! Thank you, The Ordinary!!

Product Name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Multi-Depth Hydration Serum for Plumper, Smoother Skin
ReviewText: Best used on damp skin.

Product Name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Multi-Depth Hydration Serum for Plumper, Smoother Skin
ReviewText: It is perfectly fine for my skin. Been using for 1 year. I use daily in the morning and it hydrates my skin all day. During the winter it really helps my skin a lot to keep it hydrated.

Product Name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Multi-Depth Hydration Serum for Plumper, Smoother Skin
ReviewText: **PSA: FIRST OF ALL. IF YOUR SKIN IS DRY OR YOU LIVE SOMEWHERE DRY YOU NEED TO APPLY THIS TO A DAMP FACE, OR YOUR SKIN WILL BE A MESS. this is a humectant and it pulls moisture from the air around you, if it’s not humid where you are it will pull it from your skin. When you wet your face; it will retain the moisture **This has completely changed my skin. I have great skin normally and I thought it wouldn’t make a difference. But holy **** was I wrong! My skin looks even better! I normally wash, exfoliate, essence, serum, moisturizer, target concentrates and eye cream. Adding this as my serum has made such a difference in retaining moisture. I probably wouldn’t recommend this to someone with oily skin as it’s a humectant and is made to keep your face wet.

Product Name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Multi-Depth Hydration Serum for Plumper, Smoother Skin
ReviewText: Very nice product. My skin drinks this up! Feels very nice on the skin . I use this twice a day. Works well with all my other products. A saw improvement in moisture without oiliness in a matter of days.

Product Name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Multi-Depth Hydration Serum for Plumper, Smoother Skin
ReviewText: I am so happy that I found this skincare line. This product is my favorite! It makes my skin feel so soft! This stuff just melts into my skin and extends the life of my moisturizer. The product and price are unbeatable!

Product Name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Multi-Depth Hydration Serum for Plumper, Smoother Skin
ReviewText: I can tell my skin is smoother and softer after use. I do not recommend using it daily and nightly as indicated, as it’s strong enough to see results by using a few times a week. I prefer to put it on for the day then rinse before sleep.

Product Name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Multi-Depth Hydration Serum for Plumper, Smoother Skin
ReviewText: I’ve loved every product from this brand so far. The price point is great and the product is now something I can’t do without! People who don’t much about this acid complain about it being sticky. It’s supposed to be. Pat it into your skin instead of rubbing. You don’t need a lot. It works best on a damp face so I always use a mist before applying it. You’ll look a little shiny after applying it but it goes away after you put on your other products. I wait about 5 minutes before applying my other creams over it. I pat on my lotions afterwards too because it’s still a bit sticky. That goes away too though! I do wish the bottle was bigger because you use it morning and night.

Product Name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Multi-Depth Hydration Serum for Plumper, Smoother Skin
ReviewText: This serum is so good!! It’s blends onto your skin beautifully and leaves it feeling amazing!

Product Name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Multi-Depth Hydration Serum for Plumper, Smoother Skin
ReviewText:
I like that it does draw moisture to my skin, however, I've found that I can't use too much or put a moisturizer with silicone over it otherwise it'll pill. I ordered the moisturizer by the ordinary to try and fix the moisturizer problem, and will update after I get it.
I do have combination oily skin, and I work around a lot of grease and in the heat. My face isn't too shiny after working 10 hours after using this when I wake up. I'll continue to use it and buy it again once I get low.

Updated: Tried using the ordinary's natural moisturizing factors + HA with this, and while it didn't pill on me, the moisturizer wasn't suited for my skin type, so I broke out. I have a separate review on that product.

Product Name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Multi-Depth Hydration Serum for Plumper, Smoother Skin
ReviewText: I love love love this product. Makes my skin glow.

Product Name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Multi-Depth Hydration Serum for Plumper, Smoother Skin
ReviewText: I love this product! I use this along with the Niacinamide and a moisturizer. It works great! I have been dealing with hormonal acne for 2 years. Nothing worked. But, OMG, I have been using this for about 6 months and my face is completely clear of acne and almost all of the scaring/hyperpigmentation is gone! I began seeing results within a week or 2. Will never go without this in my regimen.

Product Name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Multi-Depth Hydration Serum for Plumper, Smoother Skin
ReviewText: Yes, this is the real deal. Finally a skin care product I can tell works and I now buy regularly. My skin literally drinks this in like a sponge in a puddle of water. A dime-sized drop of this covered my entire face and was immediately absorbed. Works beautifully and easily in my facial regimen.

Product Name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Multi-Depth Hydration Serum for Plumper, Smoother Skin
ReviewText:
I have oily skin and recently learned that oily skin produces even more oil when skin is dry.

I started looking around at expensive brand facial care and noticed that the hyalurinic acid was a common ingredient. Upon further research I learned that this ingredient is good for all skin types.

This has been a miracle product at a phenomenal price. I use my normal skin care routine, and put on this serum under my moisturizer. I have used it for about two months now and have noticed a difference in breakouts. Additionally, my skin is smoother and seems brighter.

I’m so glad I tried this product before shelling out $100+ on trying a different skin care line!

Product Name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Multi-Depth Hydration Serum for Plumper, Smoother Skin
ReviewText: I can definitely tell the difference since I have started using this. I actually need to purchase another bottle. This came recommended to me and I wasn't too sure but ordered it any way. I am stuck now. I deal a lot with dark spots, oily skin, hormonal acne and I must say. My skin is much more even and toned, and I have a bit of a glow. I'm not one sold on makeup and natural face is my go to majority of the time. Now don't get me wrong, I've only been using this for some time, but so far I think I like it.

Product Name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Multi-Depth Hydration Serum for Plumper, Smoother Skin
ReviewText:
Absolutely wonderful product. Pro tip I learned in beauty school: apply to damp face, so it has water to "bind" to. After I wash my face, I don't dry, then spray with some diluted lavender oil water. Then I apply this.

This is my entire Skincare routine, and my skin has really improved. Hyaluronic acid helps healing and as such has helped my hormonal acne I've developed after having a baby and from my birth control. I've noticed a difference in just two weeks.

As for the price, it would be about the same on their website if you include shipping, and it would come slower than via Amazon prime, so I will continue to purchase through Amazon.

Product Name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Multi-Depth Hydration Serum for Plumper, Smoother Skin
ReviewText: I’ve been researching HA and struggling to know what is best. Prices are all over the place for HA. I saw this one and decided to try it. Noticed my face was plumper overnight!! For the price I don’t think I could have found better!!

ReviewText: I really like how my skin feels with this. I like to put it on then do a facial steam or spray some rose water onto my face. It does like pill? So I DEFINITELY would not put makeup on over this. Make sure you are moisturizing enough so your skin doesn’t dry out. Also the texture, it’s kinda like water downed glue? Product Name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Multi-Depth Hydration Serum for Plumper, Smoother Skin
ReviewText: I use this once or twice daily after using a mist on my face and arms and décolletage. Appears to be non-irritating and helps a somewhat with crepey skin.

Product Name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Multi-Depth Hydration Serum for Plumper, Smoother Skin
ReviewText: I was pleasantly surprised by the quality and performance of this hyaluronic acid 2%. A friend recommended the company to me because I have been looking for good skincare since surgical menopause ravaged my skin. The simple packaging is how the company keeps it's cost so low without compromising any quality whatsoever. In the makeup and skincare industry, a lot of the price jacking is due to the amount the company spends on premium luxury packaging. The fact that I can buy the same quality in a simple and very effective glass dropper bottle means I get more product for every penny spent. 100% worth the cost and I will be faithfully ordering this product for as long as it's available!

Product Name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Multi-Depth Hydration Serum for Plumper, Smoother Skin
ReviewText: I love this stuff! It’s part of my skincare routine, and it hydrates my face so well without leaving a pasty residue or anything!

Product Name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Multi-Depth Hydration Serum for Plumper, Smoother Skin
ReviewText: I break out from almost every moisturizer I’ve tried. This is the only product I’ve found that keeps me moisturized without breaking out. And it’s unmatched at this price.

Product Name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Multi-Depth Hydration Serum for Plumper, Smoother Skin
ReviewText: I was skeptical about trying yet another product but I read about this in an article and thought I'd try it gicen the price and I'm glad I did. My skin was dehydrated and needed help. It was rough to touch and looked dry with makeup. I've only used this for about 5 days but so far it has been a gamechanger. My skin is so soft and has a glow. I've spent over $150 on another product that didn't make a difference but this one is amazing. The best part is the price. I would definitely recommend to anyone needing hydration.

Product Name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Multi-Depth Hydration Serum for Plumper, Smoother Skin
ReviewText: I mix it with my Ilibof Olay moisturizer and my face and neck thank me!

Product Name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Multi-Depth Hydration Serum for Plumper, Smoother Skin
ReviewText: It seems like it made a difference, but if applied by itself, it makes a film that peels. That needs to get washed, because it flakes. Why not using a carrier that IS a moisturizer and this way it would be a powerful moisturizer that does not make a film on the skin?

Product Name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Multi-Depth Hydration Serum for Plumper, Smoother Skin
ReviewText: This is a great moisturizer. I found out recently it is very important to put a moisturizer over top of it so you dont lose moisture. I think my skin is fairly sensitive. I have not had any issues. I make sure that applied less initially than the recommended 2 drops and then built up slowly. You can layer it with other skin care products, I use it just before my moisturizer which is the last thing I apply.

Product Name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Multi-Depth Hydration Serum for Plumper, Smoother Skin
ReviewText: I love this serum. I used to use the Neutrogena hydro-boost water gel but found that it was just too expensive. I use this serum after washing my face and before I put on moisturizer. It has done wonders for my skin! I have oily-acne prone skin and I use a salicylic acid wash in the morning and a retinol cream at night, both of which can dry my skin out. Using this along side moisturizer cancels out this effect. I'm already on my third bottle, and would definitely recommend.

Product Name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Multi-Depth Hydration Serum for Plumper, Smoother Skin
ReviewText: Hello, I love all of the ordinary products and it shows in my skin, You have a customer for life ❤️

Product Name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Multi-Depth Hydration Serum for Plumper, Smoother Skin
ReviewText: I spare no expense on my skin, so when I heard about Ordinary hyaluronic acid I thought, why not see if there's a way to save a little money on one product. If it doesn't work, no great loss. After reading the reviews and watching some YouTube videos, I ordered a couple of bottles. Blown away by the results after using this! The hydration is amazing. There's no reason for me to try another brand that costs $60-$90. This is a permanent addition to my skin care routine.

Product Name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Multi-Depth Hydration Serum for Plumper, Smoother Skin
ReviewText: Where do i start! This stuff literally transformed my skin. I have been suffering from serious cystic acne for about 6 weeks now. I've really tried everything to get it to go away with no luck. Anyways i saw this product on a buzzfeed post and decided to order and try it. I got it on Sunday and it's currently Tuesday and i have only 1 remaining pimple left from 5 or 6. The rest of my complexion is smooth and soft. I probably use a little more then suggested on the back, but my skin loves it!

Product Name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Multi-Depth Hydration Serum for Plumper, Smoother Skin
ReviewText: it's worth it I've been using it for a year and I always buy it here and it arrives perfect, real consistency.

Product Name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Multi-Depth Hydration Serum for Plumper, Smoother Skin
ReviewText: I like this brand I have tried several others and for the price this is good. It hydrates and seems to help my skin retain moisture. I always put mine on when face is damp or I damped my fingertips and apply it that was I am able to wear it under makeup this way as it is thick. I also us a primer for my make up so I have had no issues using this product during the day. I let it dry in and apply moisturizer and am very happy with purchase and results.

Product Name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Multi-Depth Hydration Serum for Plumper, Smoother Skin
ReviewText: Works great on my face, I’ve noticed a huge difference since I’ve started to use it. I also use it on my elbows as they tend to get dry quick and I’ve noticed a huge difference! Something I suggest people to do to help with the “sticky” is add a few drops of water to the serum while it’s in your hands and rub together. Seriously works like a charm and on my opinion helps it soak moisture in.

Product Name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Multi-Depth Hydration Serum for Plumper, Smoother Skin
ReviewText: This totally changed my face for the better. Moisturizers alone still left dry, patchy places; adding this was a game-changer, right from the first application. It's a much better value than the high-priced, big name companies, and it works beautifully. I highly recommend it.

Product Name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Multi-Depth Hydration Serum for Plumper, Smoother Skin
ReviewText: One of my family members bought this, and I guess it was good. They didn't complain about it.

Product Name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Multi-Depth Hydration Serum for Plumper, Smoother Skin
ReviewText: I have T-zone skin so moisturizing can be tricky. I only need a couple of drops of this to make my skin feel perfect! I use the argireline solution, then the hyaluronic acid 2%+b5, then finally the matrixyl 10%+HA. It takes just moments to do all of this, after washing your face of course. It literally only takes a few drops of each of these. This is the best anti-aging line I have found. Great results, very reasonably priced!

Product Name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Multi-Depth Hydration Serum for Plumper, Smoother Skin
ReviewText: Great value for the cost. The stuff does what all hyaluronic serums do, keeps and adds hydration. And I dont feel like I'm losing any hydration as the day goes either. You only need a couple of drops for the entire face. What I will say is that there is a sticky/tacky feeling as you pat it into the akin, but not uncomfortable and as you layer products or just as you go through the day, the feeling goes away.

Product Name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Multi-Depth Hydration Serum for Plumper, Smoother Skin
ReviewText: I recently bought the AHA ordinary product as a chemical peel and needed some more moisture to my face after the use, and it has helped me so much!! I use once morning and night, after showering after cleansing my face. Not sticky, and actually can be used as a primer for makeup and allows the makeup to not be super cakey! I love this and will definitely continue using!

Product Name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Multi-Depth Hydration Serum for Plumper, Smoother Skin
ReviewText: I love this product, and used under my daily moisturizer and sunscreen and at night under my vitamin C and retinol, seems to work for my not young skin. The only thing is the price. The amazon seller was double the price of local stores. Still reasonably priced, but when you can buy it in the store for a little over $6.... My Ulta doesn’t carry in store so here I am.

Product Name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Multi-Depth Hydration Serum for Plumper, Smoother Skin
ReviewText: The bottle came undamaged, and the serum is the same as the one I got from Sephora a couple of months ago, as far as I can tell. It feels super hydrating on my skin and I love to put it on after a shower. Works great!

Product Name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Multi-Depth Hydration Serum for Plumper, Smoother Skin
ReviewText: 48 year old skin. After reading an article by a dermatologist, I've been using this and alternating between Skinceuticals 1% retinol cream and a retinol serum from here on Amazon. I am very pleased with the results. I can see my marionette lines are much less prominent. This looks so much better than having surgery. A very cost effective solution to maintain a beautiful face.

Product Name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Multi-Depth Hydration Serum for Plumper, Smoother Skin
ReviewText: The box it came in was torn up so I was a little skeptical. It does go on tacky, but it soaked into my skin well and didn’t leave a tacky residue of any sort. (The directions do say to use it before your creams to lock it in. Although I don’t all the time and it still doesn’t leave residue.) It’s my understanding that hyaluronic acid draws out moisture from the environment you live in so it might not be as affective in a dry climate-I live in a humid climate.

Product Name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Multi-Depth Hydration Serum for Plumper, Smoother Skin
ReviewText: I love The Ordinary. The hyaluronic acid, retinol, and ferulic acid are must haves in my skincare routine. My skin has seen a reduction in fine lines, improved skin tone, and a dewiness I didn't have before. If you are looking to get these products, don't buy off Amazon. You get a better price and bigger bottles through The Ordinary directly. Shipping with them will take one week however.

Product Name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Multi-Depth Hydration Serum for Plumper, Smoother Skin
ReviewText: This is one of my absolute new favorite products! I have dry, dehydrated combination skin. So, getting hydration in the right places can be tricky as I have oily spots elsewhere. This product (which is extremely affordable) allows me to nourish only the necessary locations on my face (like cheeks). This product has allowed me to purchase other cheaper drugstore creams as those products are no longer as necessary for hydrating my face. I give it an A++!

Product Name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Multi-Depth Hydration Serum for Plumper, Smoother Skin
ReviewText: I love this product I already see changes in my skin

Product Name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Multi-Depth Hydration Serum for Plumper, Smoother Skin
ReviewText: I love the way this product makes my face feel and look. It feels clean on my skin and works in the best way! I highly recommend this product to anyone that is looking for products that actually work!

Product Name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Multi-Depth Hydration Serum for Plumper, Smoother Skin
ReviewText: I LOVE THIS PRODUCT!! I have only used this item 4 times and it makes my skin so soft in a matter of minutes! the glass bottle makes me feel so fancy, but do not buy this item off of amazon! it is way cheaper through ulta!!

Product Name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Multi-Depth Hydration Serum for Plumper, Smoother Skin
ReviewText: If I could give this a higher rating I would. Love this product. I have always had trouble with acne and this is the first and only thing that has helped me. I absolutely love this

Product Name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Multi-Depth Hydration Serum for Plumper, Smoother Skin
ReviewText: This is my 3rd bottle and I've given away 2 as gifts. It's just reliable, glides on and does what it's supposed to. Sometimes, because I'm in Vegas I pat in a little bit of water or mist my face to add a bit of moisture since I'm in a dry climate. It captures moisture from the air so bear in mind before you leave the mirror, after it dries on.

Product Name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Multi-Depth Hydration Serum for Plumper, Smoother Skin
ReviewText: I love The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid as well as all the other products they have! This serum goes on smooth and then I apply a moisturizer to seal it in! It works very well! One bottle goes a long way and the price is so much cheaper than the other brands and it really works!

Product Name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Multi-Depth Hydration Serum for Plumper, Smoother Skin
ReviewText: Haven’t found anything to moisturize my face without over doing it or leaving it dryer than normal! This Deff works wonders. Just wish it came in a bigger bottle but being that it’s thick, a little goes a long way and I couldn’t ask for anything better. This makes me happy!

Product Name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Multi-Depth Hydration Serum for Plumper, Smoother Skin
ReviewText: I have battled with scaley dry patches since I was young and this stuff has cleared up my eczema. This is my second bottle of the stuff and as a healthcare worker I've even gone to putting a few drops in my hand lotion. The packaging isn't pretty, but its well made and it works so who cares?

Product Name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Multi-Depth Hydration Serum for Plumper, Smoother Skin
ReviewText: This was the first The Ordinary product I ever used and I have never went back. Using the HA with a facial spray to give yourself a double dose of moisture in the morning/night! Makes your skin feel so much better. I have had particularly dry skin especially in the winter months and have had to use this in my multiple layer moisturizing routine.

Product Name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Multi-Depth Hydration Serum for Plumper, Smoother Skin
ReviewText: This is my new go to.I LOVE these products.My skin has improved in the last week, it is noticeable!!!I am a new fan,I’ve been using Dermologica for the last 3 years.I love the product, but I’ve seen more results with this product.I mix this with my moisturizer in the morning. Only a couple drops will do,love this!

Product Name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Multi-Depth Hydration Serum for Plumper, Smoother Skin
ReviewText: This is such a good product but only effective if you don’t use it all the time or it dries your skin too much

Product Name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Multi-Depth Hydration Serum for Plumper, Smoother Skin
ReviewText:
Make sure to do your research, as these products are a little different than a lot of skin care on the market. But they are priced so well and make a huge difference when applied correctly.

The Ordinary website does a great job of explaining what products interact well and what you should use for certain concerns. Check that out to make sure you’re using the product as intended.

This Hyaluronic Acid is exactly what I hoped it would be.

Product Name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Multi-Depth Hydration Serum for Plumper, Smoother Skin
ReviewText: I use this all the time and love it

Product Name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Multi-Depth Hydration Serum for Plumper, Smoother Skin
ReviewText: I’m honestly not sure if this is the original product, I believe some reviews on the original site say it is quite sticky and thick, in my experience this is not too sticky, it looks like it as you dab it into your hand but when you rub it into your face it doesn’t leave a stickiness or a residue. It has helped the dryness on and around my nose since adding this serum to my routine.

Product Name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Multi-Depth Hydration Serum for Plumper, Smoother Skin
ReviewText: I’m a guy that’s trying to step up my skin care game. Wow, nothing has ever made my face look so good. Both this and the purple colored “peel” from this company are getting my skin compliments. And I’m normally not a big review person, nor skin care person.

Product Name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Multi-Depth Hydration Serum for Plumper, Smoother Skin
ReviewText: I love it I’m not sure about the quality of it because I don’t know something about it doesn’t feel really high-quality but it makes my skin shine and look good. Since it’s really sick it doesn’t take much for every application

Product Name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Multi-Depth Hydration Serum for Plumper, Smoother Skin
ReviewText: i have super dry skin especially in the winter and this feels so good and i can see instant plumping results when using it has made the dry patches in my cheeks go away and makes me feel so youthful and glowy

Product Name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Multi-Depth Hydration Serum for Plumper, Smoother Skin
ReviewText: In terms of the product, it is amazing and I can see why everyone recommends it. In terms of the price, you can get this for around half the price on Sephora’s website and a bigger size so definitely check it out.

Product Name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Multi-Depth Hydration Serum for Plumper, Smoother Skin
ReviewText: Love this stuff. It is a serum in a little clear glass bottle for an amazing price. Lasts for months and I use it morning and night. No fragrance. You can tell how dry your face is by the time it takes for your skin to absorb it. Hassle my skin soft and the little eye wrinkles are less.

Product Name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Multi-Depth Hydration Serum for Plumper, Smoother Skin
ReviewText: This definitely changed the texture of my face, it is super smooth now, (within 1 use). Only problem is it looks the same and I've been using it for weeks now. I don't feel it dries my skin but you definitely need a moisturizer over it. It sinks in pretty quick, too, but give it a few minutes to soak in before you put your lotion on.

Product Name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Multi-Depth Hydration Serum for Plumper, Smoother Skin
ReviewText: I tend to get very dry skin in the winter and I used this as a way to hydrate. It fit really well into my routine and did a great job at keeping my skin from being dry. The cost is very reasonable compared to other serums that are similar and the product lasted a few months!

Product Name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Multi-Depth Hydration Serum for Plumper, Smoother Skin
ReviewText: I love TO products in general but this is one I will never go without! For the price, this is the best HA serum I've ever used. It soaks in really nicely and does not interfere with the rest of my skincare routine. I have naturally dry skin so this keeps me from having to use a thick, greasy moisturizer.

Product Name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Multi-Depth Hydration Serum for Plumper, Smoother Skin
ReviewText: This product is really moisture, I been used for a week and I saw the different. I use it after the rose water it will help it to store the water in your skin, and use the moisture lotion after. The capillary getting smaller once your skin is moisture. Love it

Product Name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Multi-Depth Hydration Serum for Plumper, Smoother Skin
ReviewText: This stuff is awesome! Super hydrating and gives my skin a much more glowing and even tone. Since you only use a few drops a day you get a ton of product for the price point. Highly recommend!

Product Name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Multi-Depth Hydration Serum for Plumper, Smoother Skin
ReviewText: Love this product - I’m just now purchasing my second bottle. Moisturizing is the key! Then I put on my CerVe cream! I’m also gonna try the retinol product- stay tuned!

Product Name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Multi-Depth Hydration Serum for Plumper, Smoother Skin
ReviewText: The order arrived much earlier than expected and the product feels excellent and good quality. I had already purchased it in another store and the difference is huge.

Product Name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Multi-Depth Hydration Serum for Plumper, Smoother Skin
ReviewText: I use this product all the time, as well as other products In the ‘Ordinary’ skincare line. Some of the best results I’ve ever had. I’m 51 and my skin looks amazing!

Product Name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Multi-Depth Hydration Serum for Plumper, Smoother Skin
ReviewText: The Ordinary makes exceptional products at an amazing price point. This lives up to the hype and reviews. Plumps up the skin when used on damp skin under moisterizer every morning.

Product Name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Multi-Depth Hydration Serum for Plumper, Smoother Skin
ReviewText: I recommend this product, because it has helped with my textured skin. I also like how well this product was able to lighten dark marks on my face and overall help the skin come back to life. I highly recommend it, for those who suffer with hyperpigmentation and texture.

Product Name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Multi-Depth Hydration Serum for Plumper, Smoother Skin
ReviewText: Purchased twice now. Highly recommend. I have very sensitive skin and had no issues with product. Leaves skin plump and glowing. I use it under moisturizer. A must buy.

Product Name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Multi-Depth Hydration Serum for Plumper, Smoother Skin
ReviewText: I am a firm believer in this product. Within a week, I have seen my face get firmer, tighter and my pores shrink. This line of products is amazing! They not only work but the price is awesome! I have ordered three different products from this company and very pleased with each one.

Product Name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Multi-Depth Hydration Serum for Plumper, Smoother Skin
ReviewText: This very quickly became a staple in my daily routine. The price is amazing and so is the quality of the product. You really cannot go wrong with ANY of The Ordinary skincare products. I use this both morning and night.

Product Name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Multi-Depth Hydration Serum for Plumper, Smoother Skin
ReviewText: I am number 1 fan of the Ordinary products, I just love all of them. !

Product Name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Multi-Depth Hydration Serum for Plumper, Smoother Skin
ReviewText: I have super dehydrated and acne prone skin and have use so many different hyaluronic acids and this is one of the best hyaluronic acids I ever used. Pro Tip: only use a pea sized amount if you use more it will peel off you face.

Product Name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Multi-Depth Hydration Serum for Plumper, Smoother Skin
ReviewText: Is good not bad but I haven’t seen any good results on my face

Product Name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Multi-Depth Hydration Serum for Plumper, Smoother Skin
ReviewText: Great price point and effective so far. Have been putting on any stretch marks I see pop up (I'm in my third trimester of pregnancy) and I see results/fading within a day!!!

Product Name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Multi-Depth Hydration Serum for Plumper, Smoother Skin
ReviewText: In my experience this is the most excellent product that I ever purchased in my life , It made my skin very light and clear I love it.Definitely worth the money and definitely I would buy it again . Thank you

Product Name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Multi-Depth Hydration Serum for Plumper, Smoother Skin
ReviewText: This is my second time ordering from the same company, I am very pleased with my purchase. I started to see a reduction in my forehead wrinkles after about 3 weeks of using this morning and night. I will continue to purchase.

Product Name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Multi-Depth Hydration Serum for Plumper, Smoother Skin
ReviewText: Outstanding product. Need to understand that hyaluronic acid works ok moisture. It does not perform as well in dryer climates. The hack for this is using steaming water over your face for a few moments after use.

Product Name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Multi-Depth Hydration Serum for Plumper, Smoother Skin
ReviewText: Best I could get, especially for the price. Love the way it makes my skin feel. Holds in natural moisture, and use it over a retinol product because of aging skin.

Product Name: The Ordinary Caffeine Solution 5% + EGCG, Depuffing Eye Serum for Dark Circles and Tired Eyes
ReviewText: I have a tough time sleeping , I have bags under my eyes and was hoping for it to work. However it doesn’t really do anything to alleviate the problem. I still have the bags underneath my eyes and it did absolutely nothing . I waited a while to give it a few months to see how it works , it doesn’t , don’t waste your money

Product Name: The Ordinary Caffeine Solution 5% + EGCG, Depuffing Eye Serum for Dark Circles and Tired Eyes
ReviewText: I have had this product for a while. So I begin to use this daily and the first few days I’m like okay. Around day 7 I began to notice my under eye place was twitching. And it’s in the area I placed the serum. So I thought nothing of it and continue to use until I noticed my twitching didn’t go anywhere. So I stopped just to see if it would go away as this was annoying at times. And after 2 days I was back to normal. So I began to use it again and within a day my eye part was twitching. I discontinued use and no more twitching. I didn’t use a lot of product. So it’s a no for me

Product Name: The Ordinary Caffeine Solution 5% + EGCG, Depuffing Eye Serum for Dark Circles and Tired Eyes
ReviewText: It's been over a month and I don't see any difference. I am disappointed about this item.

Product Name: The Ordinary Caffeine Solution 5% + EGCG, Depuffing Eye Serum for Dark Circles and Tired Eyes
ReviewText: It caused skin irritation

Product Name: The Ordinary Caffeine Solution 5% + EGCG, Depuffing Eye Serum for Dark Circles and Tired Eyes
ReviewText: I bought this product because of the amazing reviews and I was excited to try it. I did a patch test on my forearm for 24 hours and nothing bad happened, So I did the next night to try it on my eye contours. When I woke up I had even bigger dark circles under my eyes and puffier eyes. The next day I decided to not use this product at all and the dark circles got smaller and less noticeable. Yesterday night I tried using this product again and the same thing happened, I have terrible-looking eyes , huge dark circles and my eyes are puffy. This is the last time I ever use this product!

Product Name: The Ordinary Caffeine Solution 5% + EGCG, Depuffing Eye Serum for Dark Circles and Tired Eyes
ReviewText: Used it faithfully...Did help one bit. Disappointed..... should have tried to return and get my money back...

Product Name: The Ordinary Caffeine Solution 5% + EGCG, Depuffing Eye Serum for Dark Circles and Tired Eyes
ReviewText: I tried for so long and I didn't notice a difference in my dark circles.

Product Name: The Ordinary Caffeine Solution 5% + EGCG, Depuffing Eye Serum for Dark Circles and Tired Eyes
ReviewText: Sorry to say but this is an extremely poor product. It has dried out the under eye area and my eyelids and as a result I've got wrinkly skin on my lids and has aged my eyes. I had very high hopes after reading the reviews and although it had got only 3 stars, I thought I could give it a try after reading some positive reviews. It was the worst decision as earlier I had only puffy eyes, but now I have extremely dry, wrinkly and itchy lids too. I had used this product religiously for a month hoping for some positive changes, but instead my skin became dry and itchy and eventually wrinkly. I don't understand why this product is highlighted as Amazon's Choice!

Product Name: The Ordinary Caffeine Solution 5% + EGCG, Depuffing Eye Serum for Dark Circles and Tired Eyes
ReviewText: Not sure what type of puffiness this is supposed to correct, but it didn't work for me. Perhaps if someone has been crying or ate too much salt and their eyes are swollen, it may help but I don't know as I am just guessing. I bought it out of curiosity to see if it would work so I am writing this review so others don't waste their money.

Product Name: The Ordinary Caffeine Solution 5% + EGCG, Depuffing Eye Serum for Dark Circles and Tired Eyes
ReviewText: I faithfully used this for several days until I noticed that my skin under my eyes became blotchy and a rash was beginning. Unfortunately, Amazon says I can't return it. If I bought it directly from the company, I could have returned it. Don't buy skin products from Amazon!

Product Name: The Ordinary Caffeine Solution 5% + EGCG, Depuffing Eye Serum for Dark Circles and Tired Eyes
ReviewText: After using this the first time my blood pressure elevated by about 20 points. I watch my blood pressure carefully as I was able to get off blood pressure meds about a month ago, and was shocked when it elevated. I could not figure out what caused it then I realized using this was the only thing I had done that was different. I waited a few days and tried it one more time. It was elevated again. It did not really do anything for the puffiness under my eyes, and it raised my blood pressure, so overall, I could not recommend it.

Product Name: The Ordinary Caffeine Solution 5% + EGCG, Depuffing Eye Serum for Dark Circles and Tired Eyes
ReviewText: The bottle is not wrapped and the box is not sealed. In fact the box was lightly opened already. Buyer beware.

Product Name: The Ordinary Caffeine Solution 5% + EGCG, Depuffing Eye Serum for Dark Circles and Tired Eyes
ReviewText: I bought this for the dark circles. I’ve been using it for weeks and I see no difference.

Product Name: The Ordinary Caffeine Solution 5% + EGCG, Depuffing Eye Serum for Dark Circles and Tired Eyes
ReviewText: Doesn’t do a thing. Will not reorder.

Product Name: The Ordinary Caffeine Solution 5% + EGCG, Depuffing Eye Serum for Dark Circles and Tired Eyes
ReviewText: Used once and it destroyed the skin around my eyes. It's been a week and it's still dry and skin is flaking off. No recourse for a refund or return. Terrible.

Product Name: The Ordinary Caffeine Solution 5% + EGCG, Depuffing Eye Serum for Dark Circles and Tired Eyes
ReviewText: Product came damaged, apparently leaking from the top and crusted and dried around the opening… Was not able to return beware if I could have chosen zero stars I would have

Product Name: The Ordinary Caffeine Solution 5% + EGCG, Depuffing Eye Serum for Dark Circles and Tired Eyes
ReviewText: This stuff does absolutely nothing for my dark circles. I can't blame it on my age, either, because my teenager tried it as well...again, no positive results. Just oilier under-eye. Genetics? Maybe. But I'd venture to guess that most people shopping for this type of product are looking for a solution to such an issue. People who don't often have dark circles probably wouldn't need to buy this if it's not a chronic problem. But what do I know. I'm just a disappointed consumer.

Product Name: The Ordinary Caffeine Solution 5% + EGCG, Depuffing Eye Serum for Dark Circles and Tired Eyes
ReviewText:
Used it for bags under my eyes. Even used it with a cold applicator and the cold applicator seems to have done all the work with no benefit of using this serum. Save your money.

Update 6/27/2022. I gave it one last shot, thinking maybe if i put more on it would maybe work better. It just dried out the skin under my eyes and made them look wrinkly! terrible product. i dumped it down the drain. good riddance.

Product Name: The Ordinary Caffeine Solution 5% + EGCG, Depuffing Eye Serum for Dark Circles and Tired Eyes
ReviewText: I put less than a drop on each under eye in less than a week my skin burns i barely touch my skin and it sting. I don’t know why i read the reviews and its all good i think my skin doesn’t fit with this product. Sadly, its not eligible for return.

Product Name: The Ordinary Caffeine Solution 5% + EGCG, Depuffing Eye Serum for Dark Circles and Tired Eyes
ReviewText: Burnt tf outta of my face. Waste of money I should sue.

Product Name: The Ordinary Caffeine Solution 5% + EGCG, Depuffing Eye Serum for Dark Circles and Tired Eyes
ReviewText: I've used this product every day and night just like it says. I haven't missed a single time. I took a picture the morning right before I used it and then took a picture this morning. It's been 2 weeks and I don't see any difference at all. I put before and after pics so you can see what you think but my bags look the same to me.

Product Name: The Ordinary Caffeine Solution 5% + EGCG, Depuffing Eye Serum for Dark Circles and Tired Eyes
ReviewText: This is the first product from the ordinary line that I don't like. When now applying this I thought it was a light oil but after drying I realized it was more of a gel . I tried this on three separate occasions my eye area were really dry after each application. Infact I found my eye area seemed more aged after using this because of how drying it was for me.

Product Name: The Ordinary Caffeine Solution 5% + EGCG, Depuffing Eye Serum for Dark Circles and Tired Eyes
ReviewText: I applied the serum to under my right eye and an hour later my vision in that eye is incredibly blurry. Additionally, I didn't notice any difference in under eye color/darkness, which is why I purchased this. I'm young and don't have puffy eyes yet. I pray that this blurry vision isn't permanent. I wish I could return the product.

Product Name: The Ordinary Caffeine Solution 5% + EGCG, Depuffing Eye Serum for Dark Circles and Tired Eyes
ReviewText: For context, I am mid 40s with normal aging lines in the eye area as well as perpetual puffiness. I was really excited to try this product after seeing so much hype about it, especially at this approachable price point. I just finished the bottle after using it faithfully morning and evening for a month. The product made absolutely no noticeable difference in eye area puffiness not fine lines. Another influencer and media hyped product turns out to be totally bogus.

Product Name: The Ordinary Caffeine Solution 5% + EGCG, Depuffing Eye Serum for Dark Circles and Tired Eyes
ReviewText: I have pronounced dark circles under my eyes I have been using this product for a while I haven't seen any changes it's not worth it I won't buy it again

Product Name: The Ordinary Caffeine Solution 5% + EGCG, Depuffing Eye Serum for Dark Circles and Tired Eyes
ReviewText: Hi this product does nothing then leaves a white residue on your face and its tough to remove the white stain from this product I used few drops only once wasn't satisfied I try returning this product it didn't let me Rouen even what crap this is don't waste your time and money on this dam disappointed really HUH !

Product Name: The Ordinary Caffeine Solution 5% + EGCG, Depuffing Eye Serum for Dark Circles and Tired Eyes
ReviewText:
Now, I understand why this store doesn't accept returns, it's because the item doesn't work at all.
If was a Good Product, they would accept returns, feeling confident that nobody would return the product. Never again I will buy a product from this store.

Product Name: The Ordinary Caffeine Solution 5% + EGCG, Depuffing Eye Serum for Dark Circles and Tired Eyes
ReviewText: this product showed up late and when it showed up the entire bottle was shattered to pieces how does one get a refund

Product Name: The Ordinary Caffeine Solution 5% + EGCG, Depuffing Eye Serum for Dark Circles and Tired Eyes
ReviewText: This did nothing to my skin! It had great reviews so I was hopeful I would see results. Saw nothing no difference in my appearance. Says I can’t return or get a refund. Waist of time and money! Plan on making a video so you can see for yourself.

Product Name: The Ordinary Caffeine Solution 5% + EGCG, Depuffing Eye Serum for Dark Circles and Tired Eyes
ReviewText:
I have been really impressed with many products by The Ordinary, but this one didn't move the needle for me.

The promises of The Ordinary Caffeine Solution (to reduce eye-contour pigmentation and puffiness) seemed a bit too good to be true, and my experience after 30 days of use is that all this stuff did was add an extra step to my routine with no obvious benefit. It may work for others, but definitely has not affected my under-eye pigmentation or puffiness one bit.

Product Name: The Ordinary Caffeine Solution 5% + EGCG, Depuffing Eye Serum for Dark Circles and Tired Eyes
ReviewText: I'm not sure how this item has accumulated so many postive reviews, but it did't work in our household. It was applied as instructed to just one eye (so we could compare) but after 10 days there as no noticeable change. No harm done either, but this item doesn't live up to its promises. Returned for refund.

Product Name: The Ordinary Caffeine Solution 5% + EGCG, Depuffing Eye Serum for Dark Circles and Tired Eyes
ReviewText:
this does absolutely NOTHING for puffy eyes.
i've used it every day & it is completely useless.
i don't have "bags" under my eyes, just puffiness
when i wake up. i kept hoping it would work if
i used it every morning, but it does not! it's just
a waste of $ and i regret buying it.

Product Name: The Ordinary Caffeine Solution 5% + EGCG, Depuffing Eye Serum for Dark Circles and Tired Eyes
ReviewText: I've been using this daily, morning and night for the last 10 days, and have noticed absolutely no results. I have some other products that I've purchased which I've noticed a difference within a few days or even immediately. With this product, I've tried giving it time to see results with daily usage but nothing. I highly recommend saving your money.

Product Name: The Ordinary Caffeine Solution 5% + EGCG, Depuffing Eye Serum for Dark Circles and Tired Eyes
ReviewText: I will try this product, because I love ALL the ordinary products I have tried, the buffet, the peel, the cleanser, the toner, ..but it was a bit of a dissappointment, naturally to NOT receive the product that I ordered. I am just glad that I'm still able to order from them during this cover 19 quarantine, shut down of the economy.

Product Name: The Ordinary Caffeine Solution 5% + EGCG, Depuffing Eye Serum for Dark Circles and Tired Eyes
ReviewText: Burned the skin around my eyes. My coworkers thought I came into work in tears because it caused redness. My eyes would water if I rubbed them to relieve an itch. I used for a week and don't feel comfortable giving this product a good review. I have tough skin and have never had this issue.

Product Name: The Ordinary Caffeine Solution 5% + EGCG, Depuffing Eye Serum for Dark Circles and Tired Eyes
ReviewText: This product *increased* pigmentation under my eyes and caused drying and burning. After just a couple of days, it significantly increased the appearance of wrinkles, and my partner thought I had black eyes. It also dried out my skin, and it burns. DO NOT BUY

Product Name: The Ordinary Caffeine Solution 5% + EGCG, Depuffing Eye Serum for Dark Circles and Tired Eyes
ReviewText: After 3 months of steady use, I have not experienced any reduction in the texture or fullness of the bags under my eyes. The serum feels nice to apply and then smooth in. After application it's a little sticky for awhile but that's fine. The caffeine may be working to constrict the blood vessels somewhat because the skin under each of my eyes does appear lighter (I'm naturally quite pale). This might be the cause of the "brightening effect" others have reported. However, this change is not significant enough to overcome the fact that the product does nothing to reduce the puffiness and bulges of the eyebags.

Product Name: The Ordinary Caffeine Solution 5% + EGCG, Depuffing Eye Serum for Dark Circles and Tired Eyes
ReviewText: Didn’t notice much of a difference when using. Did however notice the shiny sticky residue on my eye lids and under my eye. Almost amplified the puffy and dark circles. Gave it 2 stars instead of one cause at least it doesn’t smell bad or sting lol.

Product Name: The Ordinary Caffeine Solution 5% + EGCG, Depuffing Eye Serum for Dark Circles and Tired Eyes
ReviewText: My dark circles are a little inflamed. I have been using this product to help me but I haven't seen any changes since I bought it

Product Name: The Ordinary Caffeine Solution 5% + EGCG, Depuffing Eye Serum for Dark Circles and Tired Eyes
ReviewText: I’m pretty sure I have hereditary under eye bags, and their pretty dark. I have tried everything from cold compress green tea bags, to icing underneath my eyes, and a honey turmeric mix mask and nothing seems to help. I also sleep 8-9 hours every night, drink between 65-100 ounces of water every day, and eat pretty well. A friend mentioned to me that maybe I should try a caffeine serum so I found this. The price was alright but after 2 weeks I haven’t seen any sort of change. I did as the directions instructed and used it twice a day every day. Some products work for some and not others so I’m not upset.

Product Name: The Ordinary Caffeine Solution 5% + EGCG, Depuffing Eye Serum for Dark Circles and Tired Eyes
ReviewText: I threw this away because it burned my eyes. There was no moisturizing at all. Understand that moisturizing wasn't the big selling point of this product but still is an eye product. Too many eye products out there to choose one that burns, Personal experience I guess.

Product Name: The Ordinary Caffeine Solution 5% + EGCG, Depuffing Eye Serum for Dark Circles and Tired Eyes
ReviewText: The product somehow had good reviews. I used it for 3 weeks 2×/day with NO sign of any change in bags under eyes. It's also non-returnable. Either save your money or put it towards a better product.

Product Name: The Ordinary Caffeine Solution 5% + EGCG, Depuffing Eye Serum for Dark Circles and Tired Eyes
ReviewText: I honestly don't understand how there can be so many 5-star reviews unless these people didn't really have much puffiness or very dark circles. I have used almost the whole bottle and see no difference. I am 68yo with good skin and no wrinkles but my undereye bags drive me crazy to the point of not wanting my picture taken unless I am wearing sunglasses. Part of me is very disappointed but part of me is not surprised... so much hype for The Ordinary products. Maybe I'll try putting some coffee grounds under my eyes and see what happens. 😉

Product Name: The Ordinary Caffeine Solution 5% + EGCG, Depuffing Eye Serum for Dark Circles and Tired Eyes
ReviewText: This works as a sort of general anti-aging serum in that it reduces some puffiness and tightens the eye area. (It does feel noticeably tighter.) As far as reducing dark eye circles, my primary goal, it's a dud. I've come to realize that I probably just have deep-set eyes and nothing short of dermal fillers will make a difference. I don't think I'll buy another bottle. Truthfully, the before-and-after photos here on Amazon don't look much different to me, either. I think there's a placebo effect happening for some.

ReviewText: I won't say (like some other reviews I read) that it totally resolved the issue; however, at my age, I believe it is doing a good job of alleviating some of the puffiness and lightening some of the dark circles. My only complaint is that I have to place it strategically. If I get it too near the outer corner of my eye, it starts itching.

Product Name: The Ordinary Caffeine Solution 5% + EGCG, Depuffing Eye Serum for Dark Circles and Tired Eyes
ReviewText:
I like the product so far. I’ve tried every eye cream known under the sun to get minimize dark circles (allergic shiners), and this is the only one that seems to do anything. In 3 days time, I’ve already noticed a significant reduction in puffiness and the dark circles “seem” lighter (I honestly don’t know if they actually are or if the fading is in all in my head; hopefully some of my friends will mention the difference without me asking them).

What I don’t like, however, is the price fluctuation. I bought it for $12 last week; today I went to order a couple more bottles and saw that the cost had risen to $14.99. Is that the way it works—notice that a repeat customer must have had a good experiment when you see your item in his/her cart, and then thank them for their loyalty with an up charge? As much as I like this product, I’m not going to buy it on here if these are the shenanigans being played.

Product Name: The Ordinary Caffeine Solution 5% + EGCG, Depuffing Eye Serum for Dark Circles and Tired Eyes
ReviewText: Like the product unfortunately they sent me the wrong item,and they don't take returns, unsure if I should retry to reorder.

Product Name: The Ordinary Caffeine Solution 5% + EGCG, Depuffing Eye Serum for Dark Circles and Tired Eyes
ReviewText: It does its work. Doesn’t completely take away eye bags but helps puffiness.

Product Name: The Ordinary Caffeine Solution 5% + EGCG, Depuffing Eye Serum for Dark Circles and Tired Eyes
ReviewText: Took one star off for the dropper bottle because I find it awkward to use and messy. Otherwise, this is an excellent product, and you get a LOT of product for your money. Just a simple serum, feels like water going on, but then it gets sticky for a moment as it soaks in. The stickiness completely goes away and after about 2-3 days of consistent twice a day usage I noticed my eyes were way less puffy and the skin appears brighter. I have a brown patch next to one eye and I think it looks lighter already. I just wish they'd package it differently - I travel a LOT and keeping a glass bottle in my travel kit makes me nervous. Plus when traveling there's not always counter space to set it down while using both hands to dispense a drop from the dropper. I will continue to buy this product regardless. Good deal.

Product Name: The Ordinary Caffeine Solution 5% + EGCG, Depuffing Eye Serum for Dark Circles and Tired Eyes
ReviewText:
I liked the whole premise of reducing lines and or dark spots under/around my eyes.
Product makes my skin under my rates feel tight after use but not sure how much it helps with fine lines.
Inexpensive and willing to give another bottle a shot

Product Name: The Ordinary Caffeine Solution 5% + EGCG, Depuffing Eye Serum for Dark Circles and Tired Eyes
ReviewText: So I lusted for this product. I’ve used caffeine facial cleansers and scrubs and they do such a great job on my face overall puffiness I thought it would be better if applied to targeted puffy areas like my eyes. I’ve also very recently found or noticed the dark circles hanging under my eyes like they rain on my nose. So I also wanted something to brighten. From the very first application of this product my eye puffiness decreased. It hasn’t been a week, but one of the most noticeable and immediate changes directly from this product is how the skin under my eye doesn’t itch anymore. It doesn’t feel tight or dry. I don’t feel the urge to rub it, which also aided w/ the puffiness. My expectations so far are being met about this product and I expect with continued use the effects will last.

Product Name: The Ordinary Caffeine Solution 5% + EGCG, Depuffing Eye Serum for Dark Circles and Tired Eyes
ReviewText: I loved this product I think it works, it decreases the appearance of dark circles and bags too much, I don't give it 5 stars because the top of the cover starts to dry but 9/10

Product Name: The Ordinary Caffeine Solution 5% + EGCG, Depuffing Eye Serum for Dark Circles and Tired Eyes
ReviewText: I would recommend layering this with a moisturizer! I have sensitive skin and this was a little to string. I didn’t see a difference in my skin

Product Name: The Ordinary Caffeine Solution 5% + EGCG, Depuffing Eye Serum for Dark Circles and Tired Eyes
ReviewText:
I’ve always had puffy eyes and very thing and darkly pigmented under eye skin. That’s why I bought this but what is weird is that I got a black eye training Jiu Jitsu and since i’ve had them before based on the impact I thought this one was going to be awful.
I applied this serum when I got home from the gym to my already swollen AF eye area, applied day and night consistently. The bruising was the most minimal I’ve had and the puffiness and swelling weren’t there. Random use and rather unscientific testing of them- but happy I tried! It’s also brought down the puffiness i have day to day but hasn’t done much for the discoloration/dark circles.

Product Name: The Ordinary Caffeine Solution 5% + EGCG, Depuffing Eye Serum for Dark Circles and Tired Eyes
ReviewText: Although this product does help with puffiness and some dark circles, if you have them naturally this product will not cure them.

Product Name: The Ordinary Caffeine Solution 5% + EGCG, Depuffing Eye Serum for Dark Circles and Tired Eyes
ReviewText: I've only been using this product for a couple weeks now, but I have noticed a small difference in the appearance of my under-eyes. I have noticed that my eyes don't look quite as tired as before I started using this serum. It slightly smooths out the lines, and gives just a bit of brightness to under my eyes. I also have been using a vitamin C & E serum at nights, and then this in the mornings, but overall I have noticed a bit of a difference. I think for the amount you are paying, it is worth it.

Product Name: The Ordinary Caffeine Solution 5% + EGCG, Depuffing Eye Serum for Dark Circles and Tired Eyes
ReviewText: Improved texture and color using: Water/washcloth exfoliation, Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5, Squalene Oil, and "First Aid" Moisturizer. (In that order). And in just 1 year it's made a HUGE difference! I use it when I think my skin is getting dry/dingy. My skin is combination dry/sensitive/and oily in some parts. Not a big fan of the caffeine under eye stuff but the other things I've used have been awesome!!! Please don't ever change your formulas!! :(

Product Name: The Ordinary Caffeine Solution 5% + EGCG, Depuffing Eye Serum for Dark Circles and Tired Eyes
ReviewText: I have terrible, puffy circles under my eyes, and this product visibly minimizes them. Recommend.

ReviewText: I got this product to treat puffiness under the eyes. I’ve been using it for a few weeks now. The good news is I started to see a reduction in the puffiness under my eyes within a few days. It has not been substantiall but it definitely helps. The con to this is I’ve noticed my under eyes dryer than usual. Instead of using morning and night I use only at night. To combat the dryness I’ll follow up with ole henriksen eye cream and has seemed to help. If I remember I’ll update. But so far so good!

Product Name: The Ordinary Caffeine Solution 5% + EGCG, Depuffing Eye Serum for Dark Circles and Tired Eyes
ReviewText:
I’ve been using this under eye serum for one month & I can definitely see an improvement in the (my) dark circles reducing. I use it every evening. Because I retired early (58 years young) I do use it the days I don’t wear any makeup otherwise I muse it only at night.

I would highly recommend this serum; it will last a while, one small drop is end for both eyes and I will definitely purchase again.

ReviewText:

Thirdly, I haven’t noticed a huge improvement in darkness (still some!), but my undereye puffiness has nearly vanished.
I’m testing some other products from this brand, and am so excited to see if I can replace some of my pricier skincare items with this brand!!

Product Name: The Ordinary Caffeine Solution 5% + EGCG, Depuffing Eye Serum for Dark Circles and Tired Eyes
ReviewText: I bought this to reduce my stubborn under eye bags/redness/puffiness. I started using it mostly at night and in the mornings for over a month, and although I didn’t notice drastic change, I felt that in the mornings after I applied it, it immediately tightened my under eye skin and made my under eye appearance better. It is off an odd thick consistency but dries up almost immediately to tighten the skin that you can almost feel it working. My dark circles aren’t so prominent and with consistent use, I hope it will improve even more. Good results so far and lasts a while.

Product Name: The Ordinary Caffeine Solution 5% + EGCG, Depuffing Eye Serum for Dark Circles and Tired Eyes
ReviewText:
I Have Never... Ever... left a review on anything (I’m lazy lol) , but, I felt it was SOOO Necessary to let others know that this stuff is the REAL DEAL. I have tried everything, and I was very skeptical but this TRULY lightens your dark circles (Hallelujah my expensive search is over!) I wanted to literally shout when I noticed that it worked within 10min. I’ve naturally always had dark circles and have used everything from natural ingredients (that you always have to get/keep fresh) to synthetic brightening creams...and THIS WAS THE QUICKEST/MOST EFFECTIVE/CHEAPEST PRODUCT WITH THE BEST LASTING RESULTS! No matter how much rest I get or don’t get this is a miracle worker! It gives your eyes that youthful bright glow. For best results, I use it for my morning and night routine, a little goes a long way so you don’t have to restock often at all! Keep it sealed tight for potency and so that the active ingredients don’t oxidize and you’re all set! I pray this review helps someone like me who has struggled with the insecurities of dark circles for so long, I feel so much more confident now and it’s all because I prayed and took a leap of faith with getting this product, God Bless beautiful people, get your Glow on!

**HYPERPIGMENTATION??** READ BELOW!
Also if you deal with hyperpigmentation (like me unfortunately) getting the Niacinamide, Alpha Arbutin, and Azelic Acid Suspension (by The Ordinary), along with a generic Vitamin C serum and Hyaluronic acid serum, should definitely put your skin on track to recover & brighten from dark spots and dark concentrated pigment areas for sure! Also a generic retinol and safe chemical peeling solution (I use The Ordinary ‘AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution’ and it does greatt) should do great things as well for your skin’s restorative process!

Okay I’m done now lol, God Bless!
P.s. -Sorry for the typos, I’m too lazy to go back and correct this essay!

Product Name: The Ordinary Caffeine Solution 5% + EGCG, Depuffing Eye Serum for Dark Circles and Tired Eyes
ReviewText:
I have only been using this for a short time, but for me, it really works. I have puffy undereyes and a tear trough deformity-so I have these sunken, purplish colored 'grooves' under the inner portion of my eyes (a google image search shows it better than I can explain). Plus I have 4 kids, so I just look tired basically all the time. And even if I do get a good nights rest, even that makes my eyes more puffy somehow. This stuff makes me look way less like a zombie and almost like a real person! I haven't noticed any difference in the purplish discoloration but the reduction in puffiness makes the shadows less prominent so it does look less dark.

I definitely see a difference when I DON'T use it, so I don't think it makes any kind of permanent changes. You would have to continually use it to see consistent results. When I apply it, I can definitely feel it-it's not a burning or a stinging, but there is a weird sensation when I use it. It was pretty drying the first couple of times I used it, so now I let it soak in for 15 minutes then add a layer of my moisturizer over the top to combat the dryness.

ReviewText:
I just received this recently, used it about 4 days.
I’ve got very dark hereditary dark circles....and I can actually see a subtle change! It’s no miracle, but I have tried a ton of products and spent a lot of money to try to minimize my dark circles and nothing ever made a difference!
So I am pretty impressed with this product , it actually works! In four days it has really toned down my dark circles/ they’re still there... but maybe with daily use I can dramatically minimize the darn things! I will definitely keep using- and would recommend this to people like me... born with purpley circles under your eyes, maybe there’s hope? Like I said this is the first product I have EVER used, after I’ve applied and massaged it in, the dark circles have visibly faded to about half of what they were before applying the product. I’m really impressed! Considering I’ve paid $200 for products from dermatologist that didn’t make a visible difference. For the price, you have nothing to lose- so give it a try! I’m glad I did...... and I am going to try more products from this company. I’m impressed : )

ReviewText: Had been hearing about this stuff for awhile and decided to give it a try. People report a lot of burning to skin and really talk about not leaving on for more than 10 mins. Product Name: The Ordinary Caffeine Solution 5% + EGCG, Depuffing Eye Serum for Dark Circles and Tired Eyes
ReviewText: I was looking for something to reduce the occasional eye puffiness that I get when I haven't had enough sleep, or I eat too much salt the day before. My eyes aren't chronically puffy, but I wanted something besides freezing my eyeballs with ice cubes in the morning. I tried a few other creams, and while they kept the eye area soft, they didn't do anything to reduce puffiness. I received a gift card for my birthday this past July from my co-worker, so I purchased this and a few other products from The Ordinary company. I figured now was a good time to try this line since I had a gift card burning a hole in my pocket! This was exactly what I was looking for. It worked to reduce puffiness within 15 minutes, it didn't sting, want sticky, had no fragrance and my makeup went on fine over it. I'm glad I tried it, and I will buy it again when this bottle eventually runs out

Product Name: The Ordinary Caffeine Solution 5% + EGCG, Depuffing Eye Serum for Dark Circles and Tired Eyes
ReviewText: I am a grad students that in the midst of writing my thesis,,,, safe to safe I do not get a lot of sleep anymore (<5 hr per night). My eyebags have become pretty significant and purpleish. While I've always been skeptical of eye serums, I've been using this product for about a month and I have noticed a difference (and it was not from a change in lifestyle). My undereye is significantly less purple (this is objectively true), and it is less puffy (this one could be subjective). I do not use very much on my eyes, so the price is fairly cheap for how long it will take to get through the bottle. If you are also someone with a big sleep deficit and have dark undereyes, I would recommend this product.

ReviewText:
I bought this thinking I could use it as a deodorant bc my boyfriend told me it worked wonders for him... Not for me, at all. I bike to work everyday but I take 15-20 minutes so it's not far at all. I have to wear parfume every single time I get to the office bc the smell is practically as if I didn't apply anything after the shower. If I stay home, it's cold and I do absolutely nothing it kinda works but I still can't trust it.

If you're looking for a deodorant and your natural smell is a little strong with your regular deodorant on, don't buy this.

ReviewText: I used this product and unfortunately I didn't see the changes I expected, and I received the product in very inappropriate conditions, the box was broken, the container was open and it spilled. I ordered a replacement and it arrived exactly the same way, despite that I decided to keep it but I don't know if this affects the formula in any way and I can't keep what was promised.

Product Name: The Ordinary Glycolic Acid 7% Exfoliating Toner, Brightening and Smoothing Daily Toner for More Even-Looking Skin Tone
ReviewText: I don't know if I actually got the real product....I've used glycolic acid products before and I absolutely loved them all. I used a toner from neutrogena for years untill they changed the formula. It had 2% glycolic acid in it and it worked great, It stung only a little bit, enough for me to know it was working. I also tried some from poractive which worked amazing but it was to expensive. My concern with thinking I must have gotten a bum product is because I'm seeing no results whatsoever and thats not normal because I know glycolic acid works great on my skin. I mean if a 2% acid toner works great than shouldn't I see some kind of results with 7%?? I've also used multiply glycolic peels and I found the strongest one I can stand is a 20% and thats leaving it on for a few minutes and washing it off, so I was concerned that 7% might be to much for everyday use.I'd might as well be putting water on my face. Needless to say I was very disapointed. If I order anything else I'll order from the ordinary website. Hopefully that was the problem cause I wanted to like this brand.

Product Name: The Ordinary Glycolic Acid 7% Exfoliating Toner, Brightening and Smoothing Daily Toner for More Even-Looking Skin Tone
ReviewText: I've been applying this every night for almost a month (for my KP), but it hasn't made any visible difference whatsoever. It looks some mornings almost like there is a small degree of fading, but whatever seems to have faded out is back and just as bad as before by the end of the day. I thought this would be the stuff to help me since everyone and everything pointed to it, but it hasn't worked on me at all. I'm disappointed.

Product Name: The Ordinary Glycolic Acid 7% Exfoliating Toner, Brightening and Smoothing Daily Toner for More Even-Looking Skin Tone
ReviewText: It only came to me in a bag without its box or the accessory of the other cover so that the product is not contaminated with cotton, we will see over time if the liquid takes effect

ReviewText: The price is tripled! I made the mistake of overpaying here when I could have bought it for less that $10 from any other seller. Overall the product is ok. I have not noticed a significant difference in my skin. I still have my normal acne. The feeling is light, which is good, but it may burn sometimes for very sensitive skin. Be very frugal with the amount you use and only use it once a day.

Product Name: The Ordinary Glycolic Acid 7% Exfoliating Toner, Brightening and Smoothing Daily Toner for More Even-Looking Skin Tone
ReviewText:
Yes, this helps clear skin as described. I had no irritation. However it leaves a filmy / greasy residue on my skin. Anything you layer on top doesn't penetrate through this product well. I find that I feel like I'm wasting any lotions or serums I'm apply after this (oily skin type but I don't get this reaction from any other acids I use). It doesn't make such a remarkable difference that I'd repurchase it. The peeling solution is far better.

- also, buy from deciem's site. Half the cost.

Product Name: The Ordinary Glycolic Acid 7% Exfoliating Toner, Brightening and Smoothing Daily Toner for More Even-Looking Skin Tone
ReviewText: I think this is the first TO product I've been disappointed in. The feeling of it is just....yucky. It's a little sweaty feeling, and a little sticky feeling. I'm obviously in the minority here because everyone always raves about this, but I dislike it a lot, and putting lotion over it doesn't make it go away, it almost makes it worse. I don't hate it enough that I'm not gonna keep using it though ha, but I won't buy it again. I will say even for my sensitive skin, it hasn't been irritating except in the very worst of my dry spots, and even then I adjusted to it fairly quickly.

Product Name: The Ordinary Glycolic Acid 7% Exfoliating Toner, Brightening and Smoothing Daily Toner for More Even-Looking Skin Tone
ReviewText: I didn't love it! I have been using The Ordinary Glycolic Acid 7% toner for two months after PM cleansing and before my vitamin C and PM serums. I know it works as an exfoliant, but I don't like the tacky film it leaves on my skin .I'm concerned the film could be restricting maximum absorption for my evening serums. I have switched to the Alpha Intensive Renewal Serum 14% glycolic AHA, which I love more! It's watery formula is oil free and penetrates the skin without a tacky film .

Product Name: The Ordinary Glycolic Acid 7% Exfoliating Toner, Brightening and Smoothing Daily Toner for More Even-Looking Skin Tone
ReviewText: It broke me out completely all over my face, its not for my skin that's for sure, too bad as I've heard a lot of good things!

Product Name: The Ordinary Glycolic Acid 7% Exfoliating Toner, Brightening and Smoothing Daily Toner for More Even-Looking Skin Tone
ReviewText: I've been using this product for about a week and I've already noticed an improvement!! This is my introduction into chemical exfoliators and I'm already a true believer. I use it exactly how it recommends, and I've never had any irritation or sensitivity issues. I'm giving it such a bad review, however because it's listed for two or three times the price and saying that it's discounted. I just bought some from the Deciem website for half of what I paid for it here. It takes a little bit longer to arrive, but just as long as any other online retailer. Even if Prime's convenience is "worth" the mark up, it should not have a fake "original price___, you save 00%" description! Super shady.

ReviewText: Pay attention to the dosage. The product is VERY concentrated. I do not recommend the product if you have slightly sensitive skin. However, after a period of “purging” (around 6 weeks), my skin is now much smoother and softer. Due to the long duration of the purge period, I advise you not to start using the product if you have an event or photo shoot in the next month!

ReviewText: I gave it 2 stars only because the product, itself, works well and makes my skin smooth the next day. It made my skin a bit sensitive the first few times I used it (only used it once a week), but after my skin adapted, it’s been great and I’ve been able to work up to twice a week. HOWEVER, buying this product (this brand in general, actually) on here is a waste of money because it’s more than TWICE as expensive as The Ordinary company sells it most anywhere else. I strongly dislike when a seller more than doubles the price of a product. This product is sold in Canada so it shouldn’t be this expensive here.

ReviewText: I recently became aware of The Ordinary, yes, yes, I know aware I am very late to the ballgame, and have been a sufferer of for most of my younger years, and while I thankfully don't have too many issues with that at my age, I do still suffer and deal with some post acne scaring and dark spots. I have found The Ordinary has some amazing products to help feed these kind of spots one of them being this product, glycolic acid at this level and percentage is a little bit severe for sensitive skin, and I recommend only using it at night and to wear sunscreen the following day, as it is a stronger percentage, however the 3 out of 5 starts it's mainly from the fact that the seller was charging $19, which admittedly I was not paying attention to when I purchased it. The product itself goes for $13 on the company's webpage and at Sephora so just keep that in mind.
