Product Name: The Ordinary Squalane Cleanser, Hydrating Makeup Remover, Supports Moisture Barrier
ReviewText: Came fast and I’m still on the stage that waiting for result. But it’s nice to rub on face.

Product Name: The Ordinary Squalane Cleanser, Hydrating Makeup Remover, Supports Moisture Barrier
ReviewText: It does not work for those whose skin is oily, soapy or foamy

Product Name: The Ordinary Squalane Cleanser, Hydrating Makeup Remover, Supports Moisture Barrier
ReviewText: I love Ordinary's products - this one is alright, just be sure to not use too much or it feels greasy going on. The right amount is rather small and initially doesn't feel like enough but once you warm it by rubbing it in your hands, and on your face it actually works quite well.

Product Name: The Ordinary Squalane Cleanser, Hydrating Makeup Remover, Supports Moisture Barrier
ReviewText: This is a great product I jus wished I purchase it from their site initially. There the price is way way way better 👍 and their shipping it 💯 😁 I do recommend this product jus not from Amazon sellers .

Product Name: The Ordinary Squalane Cleanser, Hydrating Makeup Remover, Supports Moisture Barrier
ReviewText: I hadn't been using many cleansers before but am really liking this one.

Product Name: The Ordinary Squalane Cleanser, Hydrating Makeup Remover, Supports Moisture Barrier
ReviewText: It's my first time using such product to cleanse my face so I needed a bit to get used to the "no water at first" and "oily texture" but boy I love that it does'nt make my face feel stretched and dried out afterwards.

Product Name: The Ordinary Squalane Cleanser, Hydrating Makeup Remover, Supports Moisture Barrier
ReviewText: Very nice cleanser, pleasant mild smell and a little goes a long way. Since switching to this cleanser, I see less redness and dryness on my face. It works well with the other The Ordinary products for a nice regimen. And not over priced.

Product Name: The Ordinary Squalane Cleanser, Hydrating Makeup Remover, Supports Moisture Barrier
ReviewText: This cleanser is quite nice on my dry winter skin. It removes sunscreen, mascara, etc easily and effectively. I take a pea size amount, lightly rub in my fingertips and then apply to my face. I rub gently for a bit and then add water to emulsify and rub a bit more. I remove with a soft, damp cloth first and then rinse with water and all is removed. No residue and a good cleansing that hasn’t depleted my skin of all its moisture, no noticeable fragrance.

Product Name: The Ordinary Squalane Cleanser, Hydrating Makeup Remover, Supports Moisture Barrier
ReviewText: The Ordinary Squalane Cleanser has become a staple in my daughter's skincare routine. This cleanser offers a gentle yet effective way to remove makeup, dirt, and impurities from my skin without stripping away its natural moisture. The texture is luxurious and feels like a treat for her skin during each use. It leaves her face feeling clean, soft, and refreshed without any dryness or tightness. I also appreciate the hygienic packaging and the fact that a little goes a long way, making it an excellent value for the price. The Ordinary Squalane Cleanser has truly transformed her cleansing routine, and we highly recommend it to anyone in search of a reliable and skin-friendly cleanser.

Product Name: The Ordinary Squalane Cleanser, Hydrating Makeup Remover, Supports Moisture Barrier
ReviewText: I have 66-year-old skin with all the wrinkles, spots and blemishes that come with being a Floridian who grew up before sunscreen was a thing. I purchased this cleanser and several other The Ordinary products (serums and toner) in the hopes that they might help even out my skin tone. The difference is AMAZING, even after the very first night of using the products. I am not exaggerating nor am I being given any type of consideration for this review. The Ordinary is one of those rare brands that REALLY does what it says AND is reasonably priced. I'm a customer for life! Highly recommend ANY of their products. This cleanser is a cream that you rub all over your face and then rinse off. It leaves no icky residue - just soft, clean skin.

Product Name: The Ordinary Squalane Cleanser, Hydrating Makeup Remover, Supports Moisture Barrier
ReviewText: This works great as a 1st step makeup remover, but i don't like how my skin feels after rinsing unless I cleanse a second time with another cleanser. It feels like it leaves a little residue behind, and my face doesn't feel clean.

Product Name: The Ordinary Squalane Cleanser, Hydrating Makeup Remover, Supports Moisture Barrier
ReviewText: I love this cleanser. My skin has improved since using this line. It’s smoother and more clear. I love that it’s organic and affordable. I’ve used all kinds of expensive products and none have had results like this brand. I recommend the ordinary brand to all my friends and their teenagers. This is my third purchase.

Product Name: The Ordinary Squalane Cleanser, Hydrating Makeup Remover, Supports Moisture Barrier
ReviewText: My mom and aunts use this product and got me hooked! My skin tends to oil easily and also dries out due to cold, snowy weather. I love how it treat my skin!

Product Name: The Ordinary Squalane Cleanser, Hydrating Makeup Remover, Supports Moisture Barrier
ReviewText: OK, me... I'm a 51 year old male who has an extremely pale complexion with rosacea. So, imagine how my super red cheecks stand out. This is the only face wash to actually work wonderfully for me. It doesn't completely get rid of my redness, but it did help it turn a tolerable pinkish. Now, this is merely my experience, but I would definitely recommend to give it a try. I truly hope you have the same results as me.

Product Name: The Ordinary Squalane Cleanser, Hydrating Makeup Remover, Supports Moisture Barrier
ReviewText:
I love everything about the Ordinary products -- I started with the Hyaluronic Acid 2% and loved it so much I bought all the products. My skin never looked and felt better.

I'm on the older side and still have combination oily t-zone with all other areas dry. The cleanser, moisturizer and Hyaluronic Acid keep everything in balance. My skin looks brighter and smoother with -out any harsh side effects like redness or peeling.

The price is reasonable and excellent value. Also LOVE the size the products come in -- who wants a vat of moisturizer? They are on the smaller side so easily packable and I always feel like the product is fresh.

I'v a veteran of years of skin care regimens and I've been so satisfied. The Ordinary is anything but!!!

Product Name: The Ordinary Squalane Cleanser, Hydrating Makeup Remover, Supports Moisture Barrier
ReviewText: This product is easy to use, very moisturizing but leaves your face soft and non greasy when just wiped with a wet cloth. Takes off all make up, etc. Don't know about mascara. I use the tubular kind that comes off with warm water. I have very sensitive skin and it has never irritated it. This is the only cleanser I use.

Product Name: The Ordinary Squalane Cleanser, Hydrating Makeup Remover, Supports Moisture Barrier
ReviewText:
Edit: Love the ordinary, but this is price gouging! The small one is $7 at Ulta and this large size is $20 from the manufacturer. It’s upsetting

This is by far my favorite cleanser. I love the way it makes my skin feel. I have been using it for about 6 months along with their moisturizer, vitamin C and hyaluronic acid. My skin is doing very well.I am so happy that a larger size is finally available. I buy 2 of the small ones from Ulta every 3 weeks. This one is 3 times the size, but 4 times the price so it’s a little more expensive than Ulta. It’s worth it to me because I get tired of running out especially with having to order online. Amazon is much faster.

Product Name: The Ordinary Squalane Cleanser, Hydrating Makeup Remover, Supports Moisture Barrier
ReviewText: There is no scent to this face wash, and doesn’t leave my skin feeling dry. I have been using it for a while now and would recommend especially if you have dry skin!

Product Name: The Ordinary Squalane Cleanser, Hydrating Makeup Remover, Supports Moisture Barrier
ReviewText: This is the best facial wash. For a while, I didn’t read the instructions and put it on wet skin like I had previously done with other cleansers. It was okay but I was totally using it wrong. You basically rub it between your fingers and massage it onto dry skin, then rinse. I’ve never had just a facial cleanser remove makeup the way this does. Yes, if I’m going all out black Smokey eyes I’ll use another makeup remover before cleansing. But for my daily look, which includes eyeshadow and mascara, there isn’t any makeup left after this stuff. My skin feels very comfortable after cleansing too, not tight. And I’ve had zero breakouts since using it. I do now and again get dry patches but I use other products to combat that.

Product Name: The Ordinary Squalane Cleanser, Hydrating Makeup Remover, Supports Moisture Barrier
ReviewText: It is gentle enough for mature skin without stripping moisture from your face.

Product Name: The Ordinary Squalane Cleanser, Hydrating Makeup Remover, Supports Moisture Barrier
ReviewText: I had been looking to get off Proactiv for a while and my good friend who is a make up artist recommended The Ordinary products. This product (and every product of theirs I’ve tried, really) has been AMAZING. I have not had ONE breakout since using this and my skin looks incredible. I have tried getting off Proactiv before using other products and ended up having to go back because nothing worked. But this actually does. I will never use another cleanser! Also, the instructions say to rub product in hands and apply to dry face-I thought this sounded strange but it really is the best way to use this product! LOVE The Ordinary and how affordable all of their high quality products are.

Product Name: The Ordinary Squalane Cleanser, Hydrating Makeup Remover, Supports Moisture Barrier
ReviewText: This stuff is nice! I first used my sisters while searching for a makeup remover that won't dry out my already dry skin. It feels like rubbing butter on my face, which sounds odd to say, but feels really nice. It moisturizes my skin, but I still like to put my own moisturizer afterwards.

Product Name: The Ordinary Squalane Cleanser, Hydrating Makeup Remover, Supports Moisture Barrier
ReviewText: This product is 19.90 on their website, but you have to pay for shipping. I usually buy direct from them but they were sold out of the 150ml so I decided to order it from Amazon. This is a non-foaming cleanser which can take some getting used to if you are used to traditional cleansers, but it works well for my sensitive and dry skin. My usual routine is to use this as an all over makeup remover then cleanse with my usual Derma E cleanser. You really have to work this stuff in between your hands until the consistency changes to an oil which can take a minute.

Product Name: The Ordinary Squalane Cleanser, Hydrating Makeup Remover, Supports Moisture Barrier
ReviewText: I absolutely love this face wash! It feels good going on and coming off. Removed make up easily. My skin feel better than ever after just a couple weeks of use.

Product Name: The Ordinary Squalane Cleanser, Hydrating Makeup Remover, Supports Moisture Barrier
ReviewText: I really like this cleanser. Leaves face very moist.

Product Name: The Ordinary Squalane Cleanser, Hydrating Makeup Remover, Supports Moisture Barrier
ReviewText: I really love this cleanser. I haven't used a cleanser like this before. It turns to oil and you massage it onto your dry skin. I have super sensitive dry skin that does not like artificial anything on it or else I break out. When I apply, I blot it all over and then rub it so I have full coverage. Then I use a rotating cleanser brush with some warm water and lightly scrub. It washes away with warm water very easily. If this keeps my skin clearer from my mild adult acne then I will forever use this!

Product Name: The Ordinary Squalane Cleanser, Hydrating Makeup Remover, Supports Moisture Barrier
ReviewText: I have dry and occasionally sensitive skin, and I have tried a range of cleansers and I always come back to it because my skin loves a basic BASIC skin cleanser. For my skin type, I believe using a cleanser with no active ingredients is the best because it doesn't strip the skin, and the ph is pretty close to skin's normal ph which allows my acids and other products to really flourish vs using a cleanser loaded with acids and then continuing to add more acids on top.

Product Name: The Ordinary Squalane Cleanser, Hydrating Makeup Remover, Supports Moisture Barrier
ReviewText: This has become my favorite cleanser, but I have learned one thing about it. You have to sort of add a smidge water to it and mix it in your hands to get it to cover more area on yiur face. The tube it comes in doesn't have a lot for you to squirt a bunch on. I started purchasing from the brand's website because the price is far better and worth it if you can wait for shipping.

Product Name: The Ordinary Squalane Cleanser, Hydrating Makeup Remover, Supports Moisture Barrier
ReviewText: Its great for dry mature skin!

Product Name: The Ordinary Squalane Cleanser, Hydrating Makeup Remover, Supports Moisture Barrier
ReviewText: This is a fantastic product. I am always weary of skin products as I have VERY sensitive skin but this works great. However do not buy this on Amazon buy it from their website deciem you will get much better prices and shipping is free of you spend 25 dollars.

Product Name: The Ordinary Squalane Cleanser, Hydrating Makeup Remover, Supports Moisture Barrier
ReviewText: This is the only face cleanser that works for my face. I am acne prone with combination skin and this clears me right up. I use the same brand moisturizer and peeling solution as well. I absolutely love the ordinary with how simple their ingredients are. There is no fragrance or artificial coloring bull**** so you KNOW that this brand actually cares about your skin rather than brands that sell gimmicky “pretty” products for the $$.

Product Name: The Ordinary Squalane Cleanser, Hydrating Makeup Remover, Supports Moisture Barrier
ReviewText:
This is the only cleanser I can use as a makeup remover for my highly sensitive skin. I use this then
Paula's Choice Skin Recovery Cream Cleanser and it's been my only cleansing routine that won't cause irritation. First bought a smaller size to test then purchased this size for value.

Product Name: The Ordinary Squalane Cleanser, Hydrating Makeup Remover, Supports Moisture Barrier
ReviewText: I love this cleanser! It has a unique oil/cream texture. USE ON DRY SKIN FIRST to remove makeup, even the most waterproof mascara. When you wet your face, it turns into a milky light cleanser. No "soapy bubbles" appear, but your face feels clean and hydrated. I originally bought a smaller sized tube at Ulta, but after I knew I loved it, I went ahead and got a big bottle! SAME exact product!

Product Name: The Ordinary Squalane Cleanser, Hydrating Makeup Remover, Supports Moisture Barrier
ReviewText: This product cleans my face without drying it out.

Product Name: The Ordinary Squalane Cleanser, Hydrating Makeup Remover, Supports Moisture Barrier
ReviewText: Easy remove make up and skin not dry

Product Name: The Ordinary Squalane Cleanser, Hydrating Makeup Remover, Supports Moisture Barrier
ReviewText: Great first cleanse to remove makeup! Doesn’t dry out skin and leaves my face feeling refreshed!

Product Name: The Ordinary Squalane Cleanser, Hydrating Makeup Remover, Supports Moisture Barrier
ReviewText: This product is good for makeup removal. I use it to remove eyeliner and lip stain.

Product Name: The Ordinary Squalane Cleanser, Hydrating Makeup Remover, Supports Moisture Barrier
ReviewText: This is a wonderful all purpose daily cleanser. I have mature skin that can feel dry & tight after washing off makeup & sunscreen at the end of the day with other cleansers but not with this one. After using this my skin is clean, soft & hydrated. This is the 2nd tube I've bought & I'm sure I will buy more when this is used up.

Product Name: The Ordinary Squalane Cleanser, Hydrating Makeup Remover, Supports Moisture Barrier
ReviewText:
I am loving this cleanser & a small amount does go a long way. My sensitive skin feels and looks more supple. I use with Buffet and Moisturizing Factor.
I do agree with others that the portion for this cleanser seems small - especially when other product sizes seem more plentiful. I still plan to re order..it's that good!

Product Name: The Ordinary Squalane Cleanser, Hydrating Makeup Remover, Supports Moisture Barrier
ReviewText:
This cleanser clears all face make up easily and does not dry out your skin. It also has a very light amount of scrub beads in the product that also exfoliates with out irrigation.
For someone who gets pimples and redness from other products, this product is gentle and I have no irritation or break outs from it.

Product Name: The Ordinary Squalane Cleanser, Hydrating Makeup Remover, Supports Moisture Barrier
ReviewText: I have sensitive skin that has been rather dry lately. I've been using this cleanser for about a week now and it removes my mascara and other makeup remarkably without irritating my skin. I can't say that about many products, so I'm pleasantly surprised. It's an exceptional cleanser for sensitive skin that is dry and I will never stop using it. I'm going to order another one so I don't run out of it.

Product Name: The Ordinary Squalane Cleanser, Hydrating Makeup Remover, Supports Moisture Barrier
ReviewText: I love this product, but using it morning and evening, it lasted less than two weeks! Guess I need to start ordering two at a time. Still less expensive than the product I was using.

Product Name: The Ordinary Squalane Cleanser, Hydrating Makeup Remover, Supports Moisture Barrier
ReviewText: This is great for sensitive/ acne prone skin. I paired this with The Ordinary 3 pack (toner, ascorbic acid, hyaluronic acid) & my skin looks & feels so hydrated without over oiling. Super affordable too.

Product Name: The Ordinary Squalane Cleanser, Hydrating Makeup Remover, Supports Moisture Barrier
ReviewText: I've been looking & trying many cleansers for years hoping to find one that didn't dry my skin, but did control oil & cleaned my pores. I'm so happy I tried this, it's the best!! I will continue using this cleanser along with other products from this company.

Product Name: The Ordinary Squalane Cleanser, Hydrating Makeup Remover, Supports Moisture Barrier
ReviewText: I can’t say enough good things about this cleanser. I love how it melts my makeup away and my face doesn’t feel dried out after washing like it does with pretty much every other cleanser. You can get it cheaper on the Ordinary’s website or Ulta.com, but if you’re in a hurry, paying extra to get quick shipping from Amazon is worth it.

Product Name: The Ordinary Squalane Cleanser, Hydrating Makeup Remover, Supports Moisture Barrier
ReviewText: Idk why but having to wet my face and then wash it is so much more of a hassle. This not only is extremely effective at removing makeup, but it also is a life-saver for those of us who are eternally lazy. I wash my face so much more now that I don’t have to wet it beforehand.

Product Name: The Ordinary Squalane Cleanser, Hydrating Makeup Remover, Supports Moisture Barrier
ReviewText: This cleanser leaves my face moisturized and clean. Use a dime size, rub it all around your face and it just dissolves the make up and dirt and easily rinses all off --it's perfect!

Product Name: The Ordinary Squalane Cleanser, Hydrating Makeup Remover, Supports Moisture Barrier
ReviewText: Excelente

Product Name: The Ordinary Squalane Cleanser, Hydrating Makeup Remover, Supports Moisture Barrier
ReviewText: I bought this product because of a friends recommendation. I’ve never been happier with a product. I went to Ulta and bought an entire skin care regimen by the ordinary. This face wash cleared up 75% of my hormonal acne in 2 days

Product Name: The Ordinary Squalane Cleanser, Hydrating Makeup Remover, Supports Moisture Barrier

Product Name: The Ordinary Natural Moisturizing Factors + PhytoCeramides, Rich Moisturizer for Dry Skin & Barrier Strength
ReviewText: Bought this on Gothamista's recommendation. She mentioned she uses this when it's cold and blustery to keep her skin feeling hydrated and protected, and I can confirm it's GREAT for that. I live in a place that gets very cold and dry, and this keeps you hydrated without being greasy on my combination skin that turns to flakes when it's cold and dry. I wasn't expecting it to smooth out my texture, but it did, so that's a nice additional benefit. This is now a winter staple for me so I can look like a human instead of something that crawled out of the earth after 1000 years of desiccation.

I live in a place that gets very cold and dry, and this keeps you hydrated without being greasy on my combination skin that turns to flakes when it's cold and dry. I wasn't expecting it to smooth out my texture, but it did, so that's a nice additional benefit. This is now a winter staple for me so I can look like a human instead of something that crawled out of the earth after 1000 years of desiccation.

The ordinary feels to me much stronger. Tingles the skin a lot. I have a sensitive skin. I only apply it on the skin for 1 minute (mixed with water) and then wash it off. Skin feels rejuvenated after.

Product Name: The Ordinary 100% L-Ascorbic Acid Powder, Vitamin C Treatment for Anti-Aging, 0.7 Ounce
ReviewText: I wish the instructions gave a clearer sense of how much powder to use in combination with what quantity of serums or moisturizers. Without a ratio to follow it's easy to find yourself using too much and developing a chemical burn over time, or using too little and not really benefiting from the product. It does blend instantly and fully, and helped brighten my skin, but not without a nasty burn after a month of use. I'll go back to using moisturizers that have vitamin C in them instead of playing mad scientist and blending my own.

Product Name: The Ordinary 100% L-Ascorbic Acid Powder, Vitamin C Treatment for Anti-Aging, 0.7 Ounce
ReviewText: I can see brightness and light up, it's very fast for the expected result and my skin was very thirsty and shiny before, so I think it's very good.

Product Name: The Ordinary 100% L-Ascorbic Acid Powder, Vitamin C Treatment for Anti-Aging, 0.7 Ounce
ReviewText:
Effective vitamin C powder, shelf life is about 6 months after opening but probably gets less potent a little sooner than that, maybe 4-5 months in my experience.

FYI, for the price of this on Amazon, you can get standard shipping and TWO containers of this directly from DECIEM. One star off for this ridiculous price, Amazon.

Also, I'm too lazy to mix it together some days, so factor that into your decision to choose it over a serum. For the price it makes sense, though.

Product Name: The Ordinary 100% L-Ascorbic Acid Powder, Vitamin C Treatment for Anti-Aging, 0.7 Ounce
ReviewText: I’m enjoying this vit c right now. I mix it with TO resveratrol/ferulic acid and TO hyaluronic acid and it mixes very well, not grainy. My fave all time vit c powder is a more expensive and smaller size, but this compares very well and is a lot more cost affective. My only con: The Ordinary doesn’t recommend mixing with niacinamide, which I also use and love!! So I alternate between am and pm and it seems to be working. My oily, acne-prone skin is brighter and smoother!!

Product Name: The Ordinary 100% L-Ascorbic Acid Powder, Vitamin C Treatment for Anti-Aging, 0.7 Ounce

Product Name: The Ordinary 100% L-Ascorbic Acid Powder, Vitamin C Treatment for Anti-Aging, 0.7 Ounce
ReviewText: At 62, I had to stop having laser treatment for the ageing skin on my face and neck, because it was just too expensive. I was reccomended Vitamin C serums, but those too can be very pricey. I read reviews about The Ordinary range of products and started with 100% L-ascorbic Acid Powder. It is SO EASY to add a small amount every day and night, to my moisturiser, night cream etc and reap the rewards. I swear it works just as well the Laser Treatment and I could never have believed my skin would look this great! by using a product that doesn't break the bank. It has done wonders to even out my skin tone and brighten my skin. I am confident to be seen with zero make-up on these days (true) and have shared my secret with a couple of friends, who would agree, that finding The Ordinary 100% L-Ascorbic Acid Powder... has been a wonderful discovery.

Product Name: The Ordinary 100% L-Ascorbic Acid Powder, Vitamin C Treatment for Anti-Aging, 0.7 Ounce
ReviewText:
This product is intended for the face and not the body. Do not put this near your eyes!!! If this gets near your eyes, you might have to call poision control or something. I just know it will hurt super bad.

A lot of people don't know how to use vitamin-C, so I wanted to leave some helpful information as when used improperly, it can make aging worse and leave your skin much more vulnerable than without this.

If you are using this to look younger, and you don't wear sunscreen routinely, this can make you look older (if you go out in the sun). If you stay in all day and don't stand near windows, you're fine. Vitamin C makes your skin more vulnerable to UV rays. Please never put this on and spend all day in 90 degree weather. You might "look" ok (if you don't tend to burn) but this is so bad. It's a chemical product for a reason. It works wonders on your face when you use it right.

How I use it: I do my hyaluronic acid toner, then this power with The Ordinary Resveratrol 3% + Ferulic Acid 3 mixed together (so I do 1 scoop of the powder with 4 drops of the resveratrol) after I heard about what a powerful duo this is. Please read this for more info: [Which serum would be the best to mix with L-Ascorbic Acid Powder? You may wish to explore The Ordinary Resveratrol 3% + Ferulic Acid 3%. This formula combines very high concentrations of two of the most powerful and important antioxidants in skincare. Resveratrol and Ferulic Acid helps support the skin’s defense against oxidative stress caused by environmental factors that play a major role in the loss of visible skin quality over time. The benefits of topically applied resveratrol and ferulic acid are continuing and cumulative.]

Anyways, I saw people saying they mix this with their moisturizer, but please make sure you don't have any strong chemicals in your lotion or heavy fragrances as this combination can make your skin irritated. I wouldn't mix this with a lotion at all. Why? This Vitamin C is so powerful but you're diluting it when you mix it with lotion. The lotion is super heavy which won't allow this to penetrate into your skin. With skincare, you need to work your way up from in consistency and heaviness. Use this earlier on in your routine, not as the last step. Lotion should be the final seal on your skin (if you use multiple skincare products).

Vitamin C is a great product but you have to be serious when you use it or you will pay for it later or with a burn. If your skin is irritated, that doesn't mean it's burned. It's great to start using a small amount to see how your skin reacts. Give it time and your skin will thank you for this. It really does brighten my skin and I am always glowing but I've been using it for over 5 years. I tend to not use it as often during the summer because sometimes I forget to wear sunscreen.

Product Name: The Ordinary 100% L-Ascorbic Acid Powder, Vitamin C Treatment for Anti-Aging, 0.7 Ounce
ReviewText: I use this with distilled water per Dr. Greger's recipe in "How Not to Age." I store it in an amber glass dropper bottle in the fridge and make a new batch weekly. It works better than any other Vitamin C topical I have tried.

Product Name: The Ordinary 100% L-Ascorbic Acid Powder, Vitamin C Treatment for Anti-Aging, 0.7 Ounce
ReviewText: The Ordinary always has great prices and even though this was a bit more expensive here on Amazon, I paid the six dollars more for the convince. The product is great, it mixes well with water-based moisturizers, it comes with a little plastic spoon so it is easy to measure and scoop out of the jar, and it goes on nicely with no irritation on my skin. Makes my skin look plump and bright. If you are into skincare and want to add more vitamin C this is a great way to go.

Product Name: The Ordinary 100% L-Ascorbic Acid Powder, Vitamin C Treatment for Anti-Aging, 0.7 Ounce
ReviewText:
Quite simply, the only vitamin C product I will be using for the foreseeable future. It’s a complete triumph of a product, at a shockingly affordable price.

I mix it with a creamy moisture serum after toner and essences in the morning, leave it on to cook for 15-20 mins while I do other things, then follow with more serums and my moisturizer. No weird gritty texture, no pilling or anything. It stays potent for a very long time because it hasn’t been premixed with water, which is not easy to find in a vitamin C. I love it, I reorder immediately when I’m running out.

It’s pretty powerful so I’d go slow when finding your dosage, don’t use any acids before or after in the beginning, and maybe use an eye cream beforehand to buffer your sensitive eye skin a bit. I don’t have issues with it but I’ve been using active 5ever and my skin is pretty tolerant by now, but a too-strong-C-product burn is no joke, so take ‘Dr easy.

Product Name: The Ordinary 100% L-Ascorbic Acid Powder, Vitamin C Treatment for Anti-Aging, 0.7 Ounce
ReviewText: I’ve been mixing this vitamin C powder with my favorite lotion daily, and the results are fantastic. My skin looks brighter and feels smoother. The powder dissolves easily, leaving no residue. It’s a simple yet effective addition to my skincare routine. Just be sure you are not mixing too much since vitamin C can be irritating to the skin. Highly recommend!

Product Name: The Ordinary 100% L-Ascorbic Acid Powder, Vitamin C Treatment for Anti-Aging, 0.7 Ounce
ReviewText:
I love this powder form which is easy to mix into my skin cream and after a few weeks I'm already seeing a difference. The small lines on my chin are almost gone and my skin feels so much smoother! I have a few very stubborn brown spots and they're still there but I probably need to give it more time.

A few reviews mentioned that it makes your make up flake, and I had that happen a couple of times, but I realized it was most likely because I didn't let the powder dissolve completely into my face cream or I didn't used enough face cream. I've added a dollop of lubriderm lotion to the mix and as long as I mix everything in well I don't have any issues with flaking anymore. You'll also want to give it a few minutes before you apply your make up.

I love this powder and I'll never go back to unstable Vit C serums again! For the price I'll buy more and use this in my body lotion too!

Product Name: The Ordinary 100% L-Ascorbic Acid Powder, Vitamin C Treatment for Anti-Aging, 0.7 Ounce
ReviewText: If it didn’t work so well I would give it one less star for packaging. It should be in a shaker so I put it in a shaker bottle. I’ve been using this for over a year now and love the results. Wish I had a before picture. Initially it was for acne. After using it a month, I noticed a large sleep wrinkle had almost completely disappeared! Shake a little into your palm with your moisturizer, mix it, and apply like normal. My skin loves it but it’s not for sensitive skin.

Product Name: The Ordinary 100% L-Ascorbic Acid Powder, Vitamin C Treatment for Anti-Aging, 0.7 Ounce
ReviewText: Have been using about one month and so far so good! Easy to mix, dissolves well, long lasting quantity. No complaints!

Product Name: The Ordinary 100% L-Ascorbic Acid Powder, Vitamin C Treatment for Anti-Aging, 0.7 Ounce
ReviewText: There are lots of expensive C serums on the market. L ascorbic acid breaks down once in the serums so the shelf life is brief. I believe this routine is better: powder face with this dry ingredient, activate by wetting face, follow up by using your favorite face cream. A small jar of Ordinary L-ascorbic acid lasts for months.

Product Name: The Ordinary 100% L-Ascorbic Acid Powder, Vitamin C Treatment for Anti-Aging, 0.7 Ounce
ReviewText: This was excellent. Lasted a long time. Great value and quality

Product Name: The Ordinary 100% L-Ascorbic Acid Powder, Vitamin C Treatment for Anti-Aging, 0.7 Ounce
ReviewText:
Really works to diminish dark spots. I mix
It in the palm of my hand with a water based moisturizer. Mixes quickly and it never turns yellow as other vitamin C products do when they degrade with light. It’s the best. Besides, you control the strength.

Product Name: The Ordinary 100% L-Ascorbic Acid Powder, Vitamin C Treatment for Anti-Aging, 0.7 Ounce
ReviewText:
I would have given it 5 stars all the way except, you don’t swallow it, it’s a topical so, therefore it has no flavor. 🤣🤣

I mix it with the ordinary natural Moisturizing factor + HA and my skin tone is flawless!! It also controls oil.

The above photos have no makeup, and no filter. I’m 51 yrs old. My skin did not look this radiant before!!

Only thing is, it’s cheaper at Ulta. About half the cost. I prefer the convenience of Amazon, so I pay the difference.

Product Name: The Ordinary 100% L-Ascorbic Acid Powder, Vitamin C Treatment for Anti-Aging, 0.7 Ounce
ReviewText: I have been diving into skincare for the past couple of years. I stumbled on the importance of vitamin C and begin testing several products, I later learned the shelf life in most vitamin C serums is 4-6 weeks (meaning most serums are expired or ineffective within a few weeks, you can tell when serums turns brown or dark orange). I found The Ordinary brand and this powder formula. The shelf life is much longer and you can apply a small amount into your moisturizer as needed. I would highly recommend this product to those looking for a cost effective vitamin C product. The only downside is each time you want to use the product you have to create a small cocktail of your moisturizer and the vitamin C powder.

Product Name: The Ordinary 100% L-Ascorbic Acid Powder, Vitamin C Treatment for Anti-Aging, 0.7 Ounce
ReviewText:
I’ve used this brand on and off for 2 years and love it! Personally I prefer powder versions of vitamin C vs serum because I can control the amount and you don’t have to worry about it expiring. With the ordinary’s version you get A LOT of product. I’ve used the powered vitamin C by Philosophy which is around $60 and you get way less. This is just as effective.

Final note: Vitamin C typically makes people break out if they’re prone to that. I get small whiteheads when I first use it but eventually my skin acclimates. I just wouldn’t judge this product specifically if that happens to you—it may happen with any vitamin C.

Product Name: The Ordinary 100% L-Ascorbic Acid Powder, Vitamin C Treatment for Anti-Aging, 0.7 Ounce
ReviewText: This is an interesting experience for me. The powder should be added to any cream and applied to the face, hands, anywhere. The quantity is enough for a long time. There is no smell. It's just a white powder and the cream usually becomes liquid on contact with it.

Product Name: The Ordinary 100% L-Ascorbic Acid Powder, Vitamin C Treatment for Anti-Aging, 0.7 Ounce
ReviewText: I love the ascorbic acid powder so i can finally have a vitamin C serum with the perfect strength, texture, freshness because i mix it in my palm so easily, just as I'm about to use it. It doesn't activate until it's mixed into a liquid suspension so it stays fresh & never oxidizes or breaks down like most vit. C serums do. And at such an economical price too. Also, it's blended easily into all the mediums I've added it to as it's a very fine powder. Just love it. I've added it to my Cerave pm moisurizer, a few of my other Ordinary and Good Molecule serums.

Product Name: The Ordinary 100% L-Ascorbic Acid Powder, Vitamin C Treatment for Anti-Aging, 0.7 Ounce
ReviewText: I bought this to make a DIY vitamin C serum and there is waaaaaay more than enough (despite the container being small) for MULTIPLE uses. It dissolves effortlessly for me with the process and other products I include. Would definitely re-purchase.

Product Name: The Ordinary 100% L-Ascorbic Acid Powder, Vitamin C Treatment for Anti-Aging, 0.7 Ounce
ReviewText: Love being able to mix this product with a serum to customize my skin care in the proportions to best serve my skin’s changing needs. Lasts much longer than the 1 ounce size of Vitamin C serum/cream (which I also love, but I must buy 4 at a time when it’s available because 1ounce doesn’t go very far). I’m 65 and my 3 daughters are irritated with me because they say I have no wrinkles, no dark spots, and small pores. Thank you, “The Ordinary”!

Product Name: The Ordinary 100% L-Ascorbic Acid Powder, Vitamin C Treatment for Anti-Aging, 0.7 Ounce
ReviewText: Guys...I've tried 2 other 20% vitamin C products- and sure they were fine but turned yellow 1-2 weeks into use and I couldn't really say for sure if they made my skin look any different. But this! Day 1 My skin was glowing when I woke up! Throw on a little moisturizer and powder and you've got that dewy, lit-from-within look for pennies on the dollar. The powder is a little weird and fiddly to mix with whatever other moisturizer you use but totally worth the results. Definitely recommend.

Product Name: The Ordinary 100% L-Ascorbic Acid Powder, Vitamin C Treatment for Anti-Aging, 0.7 Ounce
ReviewText: It's actually working to lighten my dark spots! I add this to my body lotions and live it!! Will forever purchase this!

Product Name: The Ordinary 100% L-Ascorbic Acid Powder, Vitamin C Treatment for Anti-Aging, 0.7 Ounce
ReviewText:

Product Name: The Ordinary 100% L-Ascorbic Acid Powder, Vitamin C Treatment for Anti-Aging, 0.7 Ounce
ReviewText: This is by far one of the best ascorbic acids that I have used. I mix it with shea butter as the last step in nightly routine. I have some dark spots and discoloration due to acne scars. The spots and discoloring have faded in 3 days. Some are even completely gone. A little does go a long way. I did experience an intense tingling sensation. I chose to mix with shea butter because I felt mixing with another acid or chemically based product would result in skin irritation. Great product I would buy this again.

Product Name: The Ordinary 100% L-Ascorbic Acid Powder, Vitamin C Treatment for Anti-Aging, 0.7 Ounce
ReviewText: Could not find it a Ulta and wanted to switch from serum to powder. This came sealed in the proper box with the little spoon. Hope this shows out with better results than the serum cerave vitamin c. Mixing with my am moisturizer.

ReviewText: Love it

Product Name: The Ordinary 100% L-Ascorbic Acid Powder, Vitamin C Treatment for Anti-Aging, 0.7 Ounce
ReviewText: I bought this directly from The Ordinary Store a while back and I looked up how to use it, but bc of all the hate by major social influencers for it, I never bothered to use it. I just recently decided to work through the jar to make room for new stuff....I lather my body and face w some nice aloe vera, then mix this (i don't measure but it's about 1/4 tsp) w a retinol lotion and slather it all over my body and face...this stuff works! especially w aloe vera, I use the Korean stuff, it seems to help it penetrate. My hyper pigmentation on my face is much lighter...and maybe this is too much info, but my nipple color is even lighter! LOL...however I used a bit too much on my face and it turned orangey temporarily for a couple of days...I looked tanned. The texture all over my body seems so much smoother too. I would definitely repurchase. I'm just sad it took me so long to start using this stuff. It dissolves so easily bc it's finely milled. If you find it too difficult to use on your face for whatever reason, use it on your body...just don't over do it or you may end up orange.

Product Name: The Ordinary 100% L-Ascorbic Acid Powder, Vitamin C Treatment for Anti-Aging, 0.7 Ounce
ReviewText: I am using this with The Ordinary's hyaluronic acid serum. I take out about 1/4 of the provided scoop into the palm of my hand and then drop some the hyaluronic serum there as well and use my finger to mix it in well and then apply to my face. The hyaluronic serum dries fast so I do move fast or add more before applying to my face. It has not turned my face orange and so far the powder has maintained it's white color. I keep it tightly closed in a drawer. So far, I've had no irritation and do feel brightening and a protective, anti aging benefit from doing it this way. All other vitamin C serums have turned orange way to fast and are also very expensive. I would recommend.

Product Name: The Ordinary 100% L-Ascorbic Acid Powder, Vitamin C Treatment for Anti-Aging, 0.7 Ounce
ReviewText: Item arrived timely and well packaged. In approximately 2 weeks of nightly use, I’m finding brighter, smoother complexion, and I feel comfortable wearing only a tinted moisturizer in lieu of foundation or any concealer. I’ve not experienced any yellow or orange staining as some may have experienced. Per The Ordinary’s website, I use a partial scoop, and mix mine in palm of hand with with Marine Hyaluronics. There is a bit of a gritty texture and tackiness to my face that results after application, which I’m fond of, however, with the great results I’ve had, I’m willing to overlook that aspect.

Product Name: The Ordinary 100% L-Ascorbic Acid Powder, Vitamin C Treatment for Anti-Aging, 0.7 Ounce
ReviewText:
Update: I actually think the vitabrid c-12 power works much better than this one. Im back to using vitabrid & i just get a few when its on sale for $30. But if thats not in your budget this one is does the job.

I got the vitabrid-c12 power from ipsy & was amazed by how fast it makes acne scars disappear. But at $60 per tiny bottle i was hesitant to buy it myself. Then i found the ordinary's version. You get sooo much product & the powder formula lets you get all the benefits from your vit c ( rather than serum where the molecule denatures and stops working). My acne scars begin fading within a week of a bump healing! Only thing is that it will stain white fabric when it oxidizes (i noticed the inside of my masks look like i wore foundation) but just wash your hands after applying instead of like rubing them off on your towel

Product Name: The Ordinary 100% L-Ascorbic Acid Powder, Vitamin C Treatment for Anti-Aging, 0.7 Ounce
ReviewText: Love this vitamin c powder from The Ordinary and the price point is good. Beats paying $40 for a much smaller amount from philosophy. The product desolves almost instantly and there is no irritation as far as I can tell. The product is versatile and can be mixed in with almost any skincare product. Add it to your creams, Serums, mask and microcurrent/ galvanic gels. It's just like adding a booster to your skincare routine.

Product Name: The Ordinary 100% L-Ascorbic Acid Powder, Vitamin C Treatment for Anti-Aging, 0.7 Ounce
ReviewText: This product is the best!! It is the most potent form of vitamin c. It works amazing a little goes along way. My skin is on the sensitive side there is a little burning/tingling ,but Doesn’t stay and no redness or breakouts occur. Would recommend a test run on hand before face. My crows feet completely vanished, and my skins is tighter and more even intone. I us a very small amount and mix it with a few drops of Resvertrol 3% and B oil and rub on to my whole face. It tells you to not mix with Niacinamide or EUK 134. Hope this helps

Product Name: The Ordinary 100% L-Ascorbic Acid Powder, Vitamin C Treatment for Anti-Aging, 0.7 Ounce
ReviewText: I really like this product and use it everyday. The coverage is fantastic...and very light on my face. It seriously “works”. My skin looks even and clear. Great in place of tons of foundations! It works!!

Product Name: The Ordinary 100% L-Ascorbic Acid Powder, Vitamin C Treatment for Anti-Aging, 0.7 Ounce
ReviewText: Wow. There is just nothing better than vitamin C for the skin, but it goes bad so fast. This is the perfect solution. Brilliant idea. I love it.

ReviewText:
I purchased this through Amazon because this is all I wanted at the moment, didn't want to pay extra for shipping. I was a bit hesitant because of the reviews about the orange tint and burning sensations on their website, but I haven't experienced any problems as of yet. I use a quarter of the little spoon mixed into a few drops of their hyaluronic acid. So far so good.

Update: Have been using this product faithfully for a while now. Still no problems with the orange tint and my skin feels great. Although that can be attributed to my overall face care regimen. But this is a part of it so I will keep using it.

Product Name: The Ordinary 100% L-Ascorbic Acid Powder, Vitamin C Treatment for Anti-Aging, 0.7 Ounce
ReviewText: It seems to be working

Product Name: The Ordinary 100% L-Ascorbic Acid Powder, Vitamin C Treatment for Anti-Aging, 0.7 Ounce
ReviewText:
I use to use Timeless Vitamin C and it’s a great product but it turns after a while. I belong to Natural Kaos skin care app and The Ordinary Vitamin C powder was highly recommended. I wash my face and apply The Ordinary - Amino Acids + B5 A Concentrated Hydration Support Formula to my face and let it absorb for about 5mins. I mix the Vitamin C powder (just a 1/4 of the little scoop that comes with it) with THE ORDINARY Resveratrol 3% + Ferulic Acid 3% Antioxidant in the palm of my hand and press it into my face,neck and décolleté. I noticed a big difference after the first time I used it. The vitamin C is always fresh and I know it does it’s job for skin.
I love all The Ordinary products . If you look them up on line you can find the regime for your skincare concerns. The website also tells you what you can and cannot mix together. Very reasonably price and awesome product.

Product Name: The Ordinary 100% L-Ascorbic Acid Powder, Vitamin C Treatment for Anti-Aging, 0.7 Ounce
ReviewText: The product is very good, professional speech

Product Name: The Ordinary 100% L-Ascorbic Acid Powder, Vitamin C Treatment for Anti-Aging, 0.7 Ounce
ReviewText: I use it as a sunscreen with atomized distilled water

Product Name: The Ordinary 100% L-Ascorbic Acid Powder, Vitamin C Treatment for Anti-Aging, 0.7 Ounce
ReviewText: This is the most cost effective and effective product I have from The Ordinary (and I have upwards of a dozen on the go at any one time). I mix a tiny spoonful with aplha arbutin and apply after hyaluronic acid and before The Inkey List tranexamic acid - that amount goes over my face, decolletage, and forearms. The idea is to target sun damage and it works. I've seen negative reviews that it's grainy but I just add enough AA to counteract that and don't apply til it's a smooth consistency in my hands. Also I use this after any session in the pool - vitamin C is like the chemical opposite of chlorine and in my experience (as a swim teacher) nothing else neutralizes the smell and effects.

Product Name: The Ordinary 100% L-Ascorbic Acid Powder, Vitamin C Treatment for Anti-Aging, 0.7 Ounce
ReviewText: Ookkk

Product Name: The Ordinary 100% L-Ascorbic Acid Powder, Vitamin C Treatment for Anti-Aging, 0.7 Ounce
ReviewText: You apply it at night with your usual cream and you wake up with luminous skin and attenuated wrinkles. It doesn't work miracles but it shows when you apply it to yourself.

Product Name: The Ordinary 100% L-Ascorbic Acid Powder, Vitamin C Treatment for Anti-Aging, 0.7 Ounce
ReviewText:
It is very great that opens skin tone, cleanses it and keeps it fresh,
but it needs precision in use because the spoon attached to it is very large, which may cause burns or irritations to people with little experience in how to use.

I use less than a quarter of the outstanding with five drops of halornic acid or hydrating moisturizer before bedtime because vitamin C dissolves in them quickly

Product Name: The Ordinary 100% L-Ascorbic Acid Powder, Vitamin C Treatment for Anti-Aging, 0.7 Ounce
ReviewText: Love this product. My skin is glowing and looks fresh. Did tingle a little when I put it on my face but I was excepting that. Will be ordering this product again.

Product Name: The Ordinary 100% L-Ascorbic Acid Powder, Vitamin C Treatment for Anti-Aging, 0.7 Ounce
ReviewText: So just be aware that this is pure L- Ascorbic Acid (the best form of VIt C for skin) so if your skin is not used to this active ingredient you may need to build up to it as not to cause irritation. I have built up resilience over many years of 20% Vit C regular use, and I found this one stings a little at first. So as not to irritate my skin, will use every other night. (and use an 8% during the day). This powder can be added to any serum and gives a slippery and hydrating feel to the skin. There is no scent and because it is in powder form, it will not break down like other serums. I would definitely repurchase.

ReviewText: I bought this as my eye cream of over a decade had been discontinued. I suffer with dark circles and the skin under my eyes was looking tired and loose. Product Name: The Ordinary Aloe 2% + NAG 2% Solution, Soothes Skin and Targets Post-Acne Marks, 1 Fl Oz
ReviewText: I've been using this serum for a few weeks, hoping to fade post-acne marks and soothe my sensitive skin. The lightweight, watery texture absorbs quickly without leaving any residue, which I appreciate. However, I haven't noticed significant improvements in my hyper pigmentation yet. While my skin feels slightly more hydrated and less irritated after application, the progress on discoloration has been minimal. Perhaps with continued use, the benefits will become more apparent, but for now, the results are underwhelming.

Product Name: The Ordinary Aloe 2% + NAG 2% Solution, Soothes Skin and Targets Post-Acne Marks, 1 Fl Oz
ReviewText: I've had better serums from The Ordinary. Not my favorite

Product Name: The Ordinary Aloe 2% + NAG 2% Solution, Soothes Skin and Targets Post-Acne Marks, 1 Fl Oz

Product Name: The Ordinary Aloe 2% + NAG 2% Solution, Soothes Skin and Targets Post-Acne Marks, 1 Fl Oz
ReviewText: Genuine product from The Ordinary at a reasonable price. So far, it's easy to apply and no negative effects. Will take a while of regular use to see what other benefits it may bring but so far,I'm pleased.

Product Name: The Ordinary Aloe 2% + NAG 2% Solution, Soothes Skin and Targets Post-Acne Marks, 1 Fl Oz
ReviewText: This The Ordinary Aloe 2% + NAG 2% Solution is my first item from this company I have tried. I got a few new items and have been trying them all. With just a couple of drops rubbed around my face before my moisturizer to help even it out. I hope this is what my skin needs.

ReviewText: It gives your skin this moisturized glow

ReviewText: I have a sensitive/dry skin and am prone to getting pimples and so I tried this about 3 months ago, since then I haven’t stopped using it. Very affordable too!

Product Name: The Ordinary Aloe 2% + NAG 2% Solution, Soothes Skin and Targets Post-Acne Marks, 1 Fl Oz
ReviewText: I just started using this serum for my hyperpigmentation which makes my complexion look so unevenly toned, I only used it 3 nights and I can already see results coming 😌🙏🏼

Product Name: The Ordinary Aloe 2% + NAG 2% Solution, Soothes Skin and Targets Post-Acne Marks, 1 Fl Oz
ReviewText: Never used anything that works as fast as this. It’s literally magic in a bottle. I saw a HUGE difference in less than a month.

Product Name: The Ordinary Aloe 2% + NAG 2% Solution, Soothes Skin and Targets Post-Acne Marks, 1 Fl Oz
ReviewText: My skin has never been better!

Product Name: The Ordinary Aloe 2% + NAG 2% Solution, Soothes Skin and Targets Post-Acne Marks, 1 Fl Oz
ReviewText:
I was excited to try this product because I've got sensitive skin that gets uneven and dry in the winter. I've tried many things over the years and most of them cause me to break out. So far, that has not been the case with this serum. Yay!

My skin feels comfortable and hydrated and it looks less splotchy. I use this before bed, so I appreciate how quick and easy it is to apply. It soaks in completely and doesn't leave any greasy spots on my pillows. This one is a winner.

Product Name: The Ordinary Aloe 2% + NAG 2% Solution, Soothes Skin and Targets Post-Acne Marks, 1 Fl Oz
ReviewText: This serum is amazing! I have seen a noticeable different in the softness of my skin since adding it to my routine. The aloe is extremely calming on my rosacea. I experience no burning or pain. It is just soothing and extremely effective. I only need 2 drops for my whole face. A little goes a long way. Another amazing product from The Ordinary. An amazing value and effective ingredients!

Product Name: The Ordinary Aloe 2% + NAG 2% Solution, Soothes Skin and Targets Post-Acne Marks, 1 Fl Oz
ReviewText:
This is a lightweight serum that doesn't clog pores or create more problems. I do think it has helped in just a week of using it. I think my skin already looks slightly brighter. I think in time it will definitely work to make my post-acne spots less noticeable.

The complete list of ingredients is: Aqua (Water), Propanediol, Glycerin, Dipropylene Glycol, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice Powder, Acetyl Glucosamine, Palmitoyl Pentapeptide-4, Biosaccharide Gum-2, Pentylene Glycol, Xanthan Gum, Isoceteth-20, Hydroxymethoxyphenyl Decanone, Sodium Lactate, Lactic Acid, Sodium Hydroxide, Ethylhexylglycerin, Phenoxyethanol, Chlorphenesin

Product Name: The Ordinary Aloe 2% + NAG 2% Solution, Soothes Skin and Targets Post-Acne Marks, 1 Fl Oz
ReviewText:
The The Ordinary Aloe 2% + NAG 2% Solution came in a bottle with a dropper dispenser. The serum is fragrance free, which I prefer in my skincare products. The serum absorbed easily into my skin and left no sticky or oily residue. I applied the serum after cleansing and followed up with a moisturizer. My skin felt smooth and moisturized. I did not experience any reaction with my sensitive skin.

Made in Canada.

Product Name: The Ordinary Aloe 2% + NAG 2% Solution, Soothes Skin and Targets Post-Acne Marks, 1 Fl Oz
ReviewText:
The Ordinary is one of those brands that just keeps performing. They make quality products for comparably low prices. Their ingredients are excellent and their efficacy well-documented.

I've enjoyed using this serum. While I've past the age for most of my hormonal acne, some always sneaks in and can create more scars the older I get. This is great to smooth problem spots and even your complexion.

Product Name: The Ordinary Aloe 2% + NAG 2% Solution, Soothes Skin and Targets Post-Acne Marks, 1 Fl Oz
ReviewText:
I like the Ordinary and have tried many of their offerings in the past. I've enjoyed a good amount of them minus maybe one or two serums. This one was one of my favorites.

I use it just before my moisturizer and it really helps calm the skin. It has well studied ingredients and you can feel the R&D that went in. Okay, that might be a stretch but that is to say the product feels great on the skin. I have tried a good amount already and really liked incorporating into my routine. It's simple but not stale. It helps in moisturizing my skin alongside my moisturizer. I like that this can be fit into a large majority of people's skincare routines. No irritation either too.

Product Name: The Ordinary Aloe 2% + NAG 2% Solution, Soothes Skin and Targets Post-Acne Marks, 1 Fl Oz
ReviewText: I have had great results with every product I've tried from The Ordinary. I'm on my third bottle of Niacinamide and my skin has never looked better. This aloe + NAG has improved some of the uneveness in my skin tones in a pretty short time. My skin is looking fresh and even more hydrated. Love this brand so much.

Product Name: The Ordinary Aloe 2% + NAG 2% Solution, Soothes Skin and Targets Post-Acne Marks, 1 Fl Oz
ReviewText: In a sea of counterfeit The Ordinary products online, I am so happy to have found the legit stuff here. This is the real deal and it's a nice one! 2-3 drops is enough for the whole face and, while this can be mixed into a moisturizer, I just applied it directly on my skin. It absorbed quickly and instantly hydrated my face so that it became smooth and soft. I can see a soft sheen on my face because it's that effective. So far very impressed with how nice my skin looks and feels with this on.

Product Name: The Ordinary Aloe 2% + NAG 2% Solution, Soothes Skin and Targets Post-Acne Marks, 1 Fl Oz
ReviewText:
I've been using The Ordinary for several years now. I used to have to order directly from them in Canada, and it's great that I can get the products online!
This solution is water based and is formulated specifically for people with oily skin, and those prone to breakouts. I have sensitive skin, but I occasionally get breakouts. I use this as a pimple treatment (or to avoid a pimple when I feel one coming on. I don't like using harsh acids on my face, and this works great!

Product Name: The Ordinary Aloe 2% + NAG 2% Solution, Soothes Skin and Targets Post-Acne Marks, 1 Fl Oz
ReviewText: Not expecting any miracles, but my two latest hyperpigmentation spots from two unfortunate blemishes seem flatter and smaller after 3 days 🤞

Product Name: The Ordinary Aloe 2% + NAG 2% Solution, Soothes Skin and Targets Post-Acne Marks, 1 Fl Oz
ReviewText: This facial serum is absolutely amazing. As soon as I saw that this container NAG 2% I knew that I had to try it. This feels incredibly soothing on my skin. It doesn’t feel sticky at all which is great. I feel like it really helped to calm my skin, reduce redness, and it even shrunk my huge pores.

Product Name: The Ordinary Aloe 2% + NAG 2% Solution, Soothes Skin and Targets Post-Acne Marks, 1 Fl Oz
ReviewText: The Ordinary Aloe 2% + NAG 2% Solution Comes in a tinted glass bottle with a dropper dispenser. The serum is lightweight and water based. It is easy to apply and gets absorbed almost immediately. It feels gentle and hydrating. The key ingredients for the serum is called NAG. It helps to exfoliate gently and eventually gives a more even skin tone. The smell of the serum is not very pleasant, but it goes away quickly.

Product Name: The Ordinary Aloe 2% + NAG 2% Solution, Soothes Skin and Targets Post-Acne Marks, 1 Fl Oz
ReviewText: This The Ordinary aloe + nag solution is nice. It has a somewhat thin consistency that's easy to apply, it's a bit hydrating, it's soothing and it absorbs fast. The solution is unscented and it doesn't leave any sticky or weird residues behind.

Product Name: The Ordinary Aloe 2% + NAG 2% Solution, Soothes Skin and Targets Post-Acne Marks, 1 Fl Oz
ReviewText: My t zone finally getting some love, even being mid age I still battle break outs especially on my t zone at certain points of the month. This serum is perfect for everyday around that area, it calms my skin and feels like improving texture and just balance out that redness and keeps skin in much better condition. Aloe certainly helps with those glare ups. Perfect quality as I expected and definitely loving it!

Product Name: The Ordinary Aloe 2% + NAG 2% Solution, Soothes Skin and Targets Post-Acne Marks, 1 Fl Oz
ReviewText:
This The Ordinary Aloe 2% + NAG 2% Solution is Great!

It feels gentle and soothing on my skin.
I love it!
Great Value!

ReviewText: I was a little suspicious of this product when it arrived as it didn't come in the original packaging and arrived wrapped in bubble wrap inside an envelope. It also had stickers covering the original bottle. However the formulas appeared to be very similar to a bottle I already had open so I gave it a go. I use this product to treat acne which had worked well for 2 years but this bottle made my skin worse. I broke out in the worst acne I have had for years so I'm not sure if this is a genuine product and I have stopped using it. I bought another bottle from my usual site and my acne has now cleared up again. I would be interested to hear what the sellers explanation is for there not being original packaging as it seems the same has happened to other buyers. I definitely do not recommend buying this product from this seller.

Product Name: The Ordinary Granactive Retinoid 2% Emulsion, Advanced Retinoid Alternative for Anti-Aging and Skin Texture Improvement, 1 Fl Oz
ReviewText: I don't know if the product is fake, expired or has thickened because of the weather. It's really really thick like a cream. Dropper doesn't pick it up at all. The normal consistency is supposed to be milky but not this thick. I'm not sure if I should be using it. I've heard expired retinoid doesn't have much of an effect so maybe I'll give it a try.

ReviewText:
I have used this product before, purchased directly from Deciem who makes the Ordinary line of products, I really liked the product, it was a light serum that absorbed quickly with no noticeable odour. It's no longer available in Canada on their website, so I decided to purchase it from this seller for a premium price.
This product is nothing like the product I purchased directly on the Deciem site, it's greasy and smells foul. I applied it on the evening and my skin was still sticky and oily the next morning. I can only assume that this product was purchased a long time ago by the seller and has since gone off.

ReviewText: The product works really well. Easy to apply, doesn't take much time at all, and I like the consistency of the product itself. The biggest down-side is the smell. It smells like the home of a hippy who has a side business making bars of soap on the weekends. But is it worth putting up the unpleasant smell? Honestly, yeah. If you're sensitive to smell, use with discretion.

Product Name: The Ordinary Granactive Retinoid 2% Emulsion, Advanced Retinoid Alternative for Anti-Aging and Skin Texture Improvement, 1 Fl Oz
ReviewText: This has a strong smell, and I usually add a bit of moisturizer onto my face while applying it (not sure if that's correct). I put it on every other day after my shower and leave it overnight, then rinse it off in the morning. I think I'll need to use it much more consistently to see a noticeable difference. Its very easy to incorporate into your routine, just make sure to read up on how retinoids/retinols work.

Product Name: The Ordinary Granactive Retinoid 2% Emulsion, Advanced Retinoid Alternative for Anti-Aging and Skin Texture Improvement, 1 Fl Oz
ReviewText: This product is exactly what I expected although it’s a little bit thinner than I would’ve liked but it goes on easily. It feels great on your skin. I haven’t used it long enough to see any results yet but hopefully soon.

Product Name: The Ordinary Granactive Retinoid 2% Emulsion, Advanced Retinoid Alternative for Anti-Aging and Skin Texture Improvement, 1 Fl Oz
ReviewText: I thought I would try this product because their azelaic acid is really good, & this is a stronger retinoid. I have Sebacious Hyperplasia on my forehead, & it looks pretty hideous, so I wanted to prevent it from getting worse. I read retinol can help. This really helps with the over production of oil on my forehead. I've been using it for a few months now. I have super sensitive, rosacea prone & allergic skin, and I haven't reacted to it. I think it's supposed to be scent-free, but I detect a slight fragrance, but my nose is super sensitive where I've been moving away from scented products. This product will last me for a long while. Worth the money.

Product Name: The Ordinary Granactive Retinoid 2% Emulsion, Advanced Retinoid Alternative for Anti-Aging and Skin Texture Improvement, 1 Fl Oz

ReviewText:
Smoothing, non-greasy, non-irritating.
Delicate, it can also be used every evening, in autumn/winter.
Test your skin's tolerance to the product and use 50+ sunscreen during the day.
I have reactive and delicate skin and I had no problems with this cream.
It is best to use it gradually, increasing the frequency of applications over time.

Product Name: The Ordinary Granactive Retinoid 2% Emulsion, Advanced Retinoid Alternative for Anti-Aging and Skin Texture Improvement, 1 Fl Oz
ReviewText:
I ordered the 2% Emulsion but received the 5% Granactive in error. I went ahead with the product anyway and am happy with the results so far. I had only mild irritation after the first use and waited a week before trying it again.
It’s lightweight and virtually scent free. About 2-3 drops is all you need. To soon to see any major results. I would buy from this seller again.

Product Name: The Ordinary Granactive Retinoid 2% Emulsion, Advanced Retinoid Alternative for Anti-Aging and Skin Texture Improvement, 1 Fl Oz
ReviewText:
I looked into the chemistry and biology behind this product before purchasing, all is based on legitimate researh, as opposed to all the very expensive snake oil other products. The retinol is the active ingredient, everything else is pretty much fluff.

I calibrated against my face using a laser 3d scanner before use and have been using for a year now, with a net reduction of 0.05 mm in reduction of fine line wrinkles, wrinkles more than .4mm in depth are largely unaffected.

Unfortunately the price of this product has almost doubled in 6 months, unjustifiable for a very cheap chemical to produce. I therefore will be ordering a different retinol product in future.

Product Name: The Ordinary Granactive Retinoid 2% Emulsion, Advanced Retinoid Alternative for Anti-Aging and Skin Texture Improvement, 1 Fl Oz
ReviewText: At the moment it seems good, I have been using it for a few weeks, however I had been told that retinol is not used daily because it can be irritating and I use it every night and it hasn't happened to me, for better or worse.

Product Name: The Ordinary Granactive Retinoid 2% Emulsion, Advanced Retinoid Alternative for Anti-Aging and Skin Texture Improvement, 1 Fl Oz
ReviewText: To anyone who uses this product but find it harsh on the skin, you must put Vaseline on after the retinol. I am able to use the retinol every night if I wish. I put it on after cleansing. Leave it for ten minutes. Gently wipe my face with damp cloth to remove excess. Then apply Vaseline balm all over face. My face is so soft and smooth and radiant each morning. The retinol does its job and the Vaseline protects. The perfect combination

Some reviews say stick with it but I had defo big spots and didn’t want to chance it so gave it to my mum who has dryer skin and it worked well on her skin

Product Name: The Ordinary Granactive Retinoid 2% Emulsion, Advanced Retinoid Alternative for Anti-Aging and Skin Texture Improvement, 1 Fl Oz
ReviewText: I've been using the retinol emulsion for a while now, and I'm really impressed with the results. I apply it before bed, and when I wake up, my skin feels noticeably softer and smoother. I love the milky consistency—it’s lightweight and absorbs easily, which makes it a breeze to apply. The only downside is that it can leave my skin feeling a bit dry, but I counter this by using a very moisturizing cream in the morning. Overall, I think it’s a fantastic product for the price—effective and gentle enough to make a real difference without breaking the bank.

Product Name: The Ordinary Granactive Retinoid 2% Emulsion, Advanced Retinoid Alternative for Anti-Aging and Skin Texture Improvement, 1 Fl Oz
ReviewText: Now I get it why it’s one of the best selling products from the ordinary. And that’s why I love most products from them, it’s very affordable too. It’s not sticky or greasy, it’s just light, but it makes your skin soft and hydrated, and with long term use, gets rid of wrinkles which makes you look young. Don’t expect this to work magically for you overnight. You have to use this long term consistently because it really helps. Quality is perfect and it’s effective!

Product Name: The Ordinary Granactive Retinoid 2% Emulsion, Advanced Retinoid Alternative for Anti-Aging and Skin Texture Improvement, 1 Fl Oz
ReviewText: After researching EVERY retinol serum in the world...I chose this one. AND WOW!!! I LOVE IT! I was using Murad's and I liked it but it dried quickly and disappeared on my skin. I'm sure it was doing its job, but The Ordinary serum is so much more satisfying on the skin. It sinks in but it doesn't dry out immediately. It's a milky emulsion that gently lingers ever so slightly so I never feel dry. I still use my moisturizer on top but I don't have to use as much so I'm also saving money. My skin feels supple in the morning too. I'm really looking forward to the results at the end of my bottle. I'm positive my skin is going to look great! I'm very happy with my purchase.

Product Name: The Ordinary Granactive Retinoid 2% Emulsion, Advanced Retinoid Alternative for Anti-Aging and Skin Texture Improvement, 1 Fl Oz
ReviewText: Amazing products I absolutely love all products from ordinary my face has never looked so good even when I was much younger I’m going to be 60 years old July 27.I am shocked how quickly this works I hope that All. Ordinary products never gets discontinued it would be very devastating I have spent so many thousands of dollars on skin care products through the years and nothing I’ve ever tried before has done what ordinary products Have done to my skin I’m very thankful for them.

ReviewText: I’m an amazon addict, yet have only written one review..until now. I’m 45 and have embarrassing wrinkles. I have tried every product out there. I think about Botox but am too scared. I’m on day two, using it on my forehead and above my lips. My wrinkles on my forehead, after night one, are already visibly less deep. I’m not getting paid or a free bottle like some other joke products out there (although I should- lol)...I promise if you are looking for a product that’s real, this is it. I woke up, looked in the mirror, and cried I was so happy! My lip result isn’t so fast, but I have great faith. I had a bad habit of smoking and if this works above my lips like it is on my forehead, I’ll pay the company!!!

Product Name: The Ordinary Granactive Retinoid 2% Emulsion, Advanced Retinoid Alternative for Anti-Aging and Skin Texture Improvement, 1 Fl Oz
ReviewText:
Play Video
Granactive Retinoid 2% emulsion🤎
@skincareobsessed____

Soo I’ve been using this Retinoid for about a month, and I’ve been using this during my alternate nights of using tretinoin. My upgraded dosage does sensitize my skin a bit so I do need a couple of nights off. I do use the Retinoid 3-4x a week). The Granactive Retinoid has a strength of 2 percent but, I don’t really have trouble with getting use to the strength since I’m an regular user of vitamin A. The texture is very lovely and has a milky consistency which I find hydrating to the skin in my opinion.

As in for my skin, it is making me purge. So I knew this was bound to happen and I’m not mad at it(Purge for the better skin🤗). I started purging around the 2nd week of using it and I’m still purging as of now. I did notice the appearance of my other dark spots fading a less slowly than usual, so that’s a plus. And I have a lot of product left over so it’s gonna last me a while.

I definitely recommend this Retinoid to beginners who wanna start using Vitamin A derivatives. Due to the non irritating ingredients, Deciem claims It’s very mild and its non irritating. As a person with sensitive skin I totally urge people with sensitive skin to use it(but then again everyone’s skin is different).

Product Name: The Ordinary Granactive Retinoid 2% Emulsion, Advanced Retinoid Alternative for Anti-Aging and Skin Texture Improvement, 1 Fl Oz
ReviewText: So impressed with this product, I’m ditching my prescription Retin-a. Much prefer this formula over the squalane based formula...doesn’t break me out. It’s not irritating or drying, speeds turnover & boosts collagen. Combined w/ Ordinary Niacinamide/Zinc it’s truly incredible...& it improves skin rapidly!

Product Name: The Ordinary Matrixyl 10% + HA, Anti-Aging Serum for Fine Lines and Wrinkles, 1 Fl Oz
ReviewText: I've only been using this for a few days now and I know that's not much time. It's not that I expected every single imperfection to disappear overnight...but what compelled me to write this is: just after 72 hours of twice daily use...it has made my skin SUPER blotchy (which it wasn't before), makes my face look and feel extremely greasy (I have normal skin with dry areas, my skin is never oily), and it's made all of my imperfections stand out! I feel the few little lines that drive me nuts actually look WORSE. My 11s look deeper and so do my marionette lines. I look terrible after using this for just a few days! I've also noticed little bumps forming all over my face, in my tear troughs, along near the jawline on either side, and on my forehead. I would advise those of you wanting to try this: do so ONLY if you are at a very advanced age and moisture has naturally been depleted from your skin, or if your face is normally the Sahara desert no matter what age. But if you're still in the menstrual years or if you have oily skin: STAY AWAY! This product is NOT for everyone!

I have been using it for about 3 months, no change at all. I was so excited about the product I spend around £130 on their products including their foundation (which is rank rotten). Was told by a dermatologist that these products can help PREVENT aging not improve the skin. So the claims are a bit far fetched. I also question why there are so many positive reviews, one has to consider, skin condition and age of person reviewing else the review could be pointless (to me anyway).

ReviewText: I really wanted to like this product, however once applied it makes my skin sting for a few minutes. Product Name: The Ordinary Matrixyl 10% + HA, Anti-Aging Serum for Fine Lines and Wrinkles, 1 Fl Oz
ReviewText: I loved this serum as soon as I started using it. I swear I saw a difference in the first couple of days, especially on my lip lines. Unfortunately though, I then started to get tingling around my mouth, which eventually resulted in 'chapped' lips. I let them heal then went back to using the serum less often, eventually down to once a week but the same thing kept happening. I eventually gave up with this product and tried the 'buffet' serum instead (less matrixyl) but I still get tingly lips a couple of days after using it. I am now completely avoiding my mouth area (my main area of concern) and only use 'buffet' a couple of times a week but can still feel my lips tingling! I do think Matrixyl works and is definitely worth a try but just be aware in case you are also sensitive to the product .

ReviewText: The Ordinary products are a dream! It’s some of the best ingredients you can get for your skin at such an amazing price! The quality is top of the line and the selection is unbeatable! I learned about this serum after having Botox, when used with other serums it extends the effects of the injections! It truly shows results too! The tough glass bottle is eco friendly, the size and amount are above expectations for the price and quality! This serum feels amazing on your skin, has no odor and is an all around one of the best products I’ve ever used! I recommend this to everyone and will continue to do so! This is a staple in my skincare routine! You can’t go wrong with The Ordinary products!

Product Name: The Ordinary Matrixyl 10% + HA, Anti-Aging Serum for Fine Lines and Wrinkles, 1 Fl Oz
ReviewText:
Let me start by saying that i m a cosmetic junky and i m a guy. i simoly like to idea that i take care of my apperance and how i present my self tothe world. i spend fortunes on big brands , big promises never seen a long result. Deciem produces active ingredients and holy cow they are active indeed. i m using this one among 4 other substances and my skin has gone from dull to glow and healthy within the forst 2 weeks. I know everyone has a different sensitivity level and i wnat to point out this is how my skin reacted . I am almost 50 and stiull have breakouts from time to time. that ended with a comninabtion of the Viatmin C30 at night and this priduct , Buffet, and nicainamin during the day. Sunscreen is a logic step if you make the effort to enteretain such treatments. And as i dont like. to say the word cheap , these are . I spend now 100 $ every 8-10 weeks , and have a battert of active helpers. I wished they exosted years agoi when i was willing to spend 300 bucks for a high end swiss prodct that clocged my pores royaly.
i recommend to try what works for you and then stick with it for some time . i belive they have a very good range but proceed with caution oif you have super-senstiv skin , these are ACTIVE ingrediens indeed.

Product Name: The Ordinary Matrixyl 10% + HA, Anti-Aging Serum for Fine Lines and Wrinkles, 1 Fl Oz
ReviewText: You can not go wrong with the Ordinary products. They are aweome and are at a super price. Great results

Product Name: The Ordinary Matrixyl 10% + HA, Anti-Aging Serum for Fine Lines and Wrinkles, 1 Fl Oz
ReviewText:
Wow! Drastic change from old drab 60 year old lifeless skin. To young, fresh supple and dewey plump!
Not botox… but my guess is if you start this early you might not need botox! Wow! Only a drop of each … rub together and smooth over your face. My daughter noticed in 3 days. She ran out and got some today! Price is right and results . Awesome!
